Addresses
  • Create new address
  • Reorder user's addresses
  • Setup Address
    • Setup new non-subuser address
    • Get Addresses
  • Address
    • Get Address
    • Update address
    • Enable Address
    • Disable Address
    • Delete a Disabled Address

  • Get array of VPN logical server information
  • Get array of VPN server information
  • Create Logical Server
  • Create Server
  • Update Logical Server
  • Update Server
  • Delete Logical Server
  • Delete Server
Attachments
  • Get an attachment by ID
  • Upload an attachment to a draft message
  • Update an attachment's signature on a draft message
  • Delete an attachment from a draft message
Authentication
  • Authenticate
  • Refresh an expired token
  • Set secure cookies, web app only
  • Set up SRP authentication request
  • Get random SRP modulus
  • Get active sessions
  • Revoke a token
  • Revoke a session by UID, locked
  • Revoke all other access tokens, locked
Betas
  • Get a specific beta registration
  • Get all beta registrations
  • Create or update beta registration
  • Delete a specific beta registration
  • Delete all beta registrations
Contacts
  • Get a list of contacts minus their data for when user visits the contact page
  • Get all contacts for export
  • Get full Contact
  • Create new contacts
  • Update a contact
  • Label an array of contacts
  • Unlabel an array of contacts
  • Delete array of contacts
  • Delete all contacts
  • Get a list of contact emails
  • Label an array of ContactEmails
  • Unlabel an array of ContactEmails
Conversations
  • Get a list of conversations
  • Get conversation and associated message metadata
  • Get grouped conversation count
  • Mark an array of conversations as read
  • Mark an array of conversations as unread
  • Delete trashed messages in an array of conversations
  • Label/move an array of conversations
  • Unlabel an array of conversations

  • Register device
  • UnRegister device
  • iOS Notification Test
  • Android Notification Test
Domains
  • Get all domains for this user's organization and check their DNS's
  • Get a specific domains and its check DNS
  • Get a specific domain's addresses
  • Get available domains
  • Get premium domains
  • Create new Domain, locked route
  • Set catch-all address, locked route
  • Delete a Domain, locked route
EO
  • Get an encrypted access token by ID
  • Get an EO message
  • Get an EO attachment by ID
  • Reply to an EO message
Events
  • Get latest event ID, only use with empty cache to bootstrap event stream
  • Get events since id

  • Create filters
    • Add filter using Sieve
    • Add filter using Tree
  • Get filters owned by the current user
  • Delete all of user's filters
  • Update parameters of a specific filter
  • Check sieve filter syntax
  • Enable a specific filter
  • Disable a specific filter
  • Delete a specific filter

Invitation
  • Create Invitation
Keys
  • Get public keys
  • Get key salts, locked route
  • Create new address key, locked route
  • Setup keys for new account, private user
  • Install a new key for each address
  • Activate newly-provisioned member key by sending a key copy encrypted with current mailbox password
  • Make address key primary, locked route
  • Update key flags, locked route
  • Reactivate inactive key by sending a key copy encrypted with current mailbox password, locked route
  • Update private keys only, use for mailbox password/single password updates
  • Upgrade private keys with obsolete or incorrect metadata
  • Delete key, locked route

  • Update existing label

  • Get authentication logs
  • Delete all authentication logs

  • Delete member key, locked route

      https://api.protonmail.ch

      ProtonMail API

      API Endpoint
      https://api.protonmail.ch

      This is the documentation to ProtonMail API

      Addresses ¶

      Create Address ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/addresses
      Requestsexample
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Local": "me",
  "Domain": "funoccupied.com",
  "DisplayName": "hi",
  "Signature": "signature"
}
      Responses20030004
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Access: application/vnd.protonmail.api+json;apiversion=0
      Body
      {
  "Address": {
    "ID": "vuGSa1zsx0kV0jsfhX_xKSDQ0dvcLdMduA_c2c9fhaC1ZYCZKe8gony7nIWbnqaj8gebXLCQre1H1ZTKkhhFxA==",
    "DomainID": "X_bSECsnvCSHHR44lXWMDOYDiZpbTUzqnQFyf_pqDq-JjXxXJCv_jQmSOLhD3e3A==",
    "Email": "me@funoccupied.com",
    "Send": 1,
    "Status": 1,
    "Type": 1,
    "Receive": 1,
    "Order": 5,
    "DisplayName": "hi",
    "Signature": "signature",
    "HasKeys": 1,
    "MemberID": "gony7nIWbnqaj8gebXLCQre1H1ZTKkhhFxA==",
    "MemberName": "Fred"
  },
  "Code": 1000
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Access: application/vnd.protonmail.api+json;apiversion=0
      Body
      {
  "Code": 30004,
  "Error": "Domain not found",
  "Details": {}
}

      Create new address
      POST/addresses

      Locked route

      Attributes ¶

      • Local (string) - local part

        "Local": "user"

      • Domain (string) - either custom domain or a protonmail domain

        "Domain": "funoccupied.com"

      • DisplayName: optional, default empty

        "DisplayName": "hi"

      • Signature: optional, default empty

        "Signature": "signature"

      Response ¶

      • Status (integer) - 0 is disabled, 1 is enabled, can be set by user

      • Type (integer) - 1 is original PM, 2 is PM alias, 3 is custom domain address

      • Receive (integer) - 1 is active address (Status=1 and has key), 0 is inactive (cannot send or receive)

      • DisplayName (string) - optional, default empty

      • Signature (string) - optional, default empty

      Order Addresses ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/addresses/order
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "AddressIDs" : [     // Will amend the order of addresses with the order of the corresponding AddressIDs
        "-Bpgivr5H2qGDRiUQ4-7gm5YLf215MEgZCdzOtLW5psxgB8oNc8OnoFRykab4Z23EGEW1ka3GtQPF9xwx9-VUA==",
        "pIJGEYyNFsPEb61otAc47_X8eoSeAfMSokny6dmg3jg2JrcdohiRuWSN2i1rgnkEnZmolVx4Np96IcwxJh1WNw==",
        "l8vWAXHBQmv0u7OVtPbcqMa4iwQaBqowINSQjPrxAr-Da8fVPKUkUcqAq30_BCxj1X0nW70HQRmAa-rIvzmKUA=="
    ],
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Reorder user's addresses
      PUT/addresses/order

      Setup Address ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/addresses/setup
      Requestsexample
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Domain": "protonmail.com",
  "DisplayName": "hi",
  "Signature": "signature"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Access: application/vnd.protonmail.api+json;apiversion=0
      Body
      {
  "Address": {
    "ID": "vuGSa1zsx0kV0jsfhX_xKSDQ0dvcLdMduA_c2c9fhaC1ZYCZKe8gony7nIWbnqaj8gebXLCQre1H1ZTKkhhFxA==",
    "DomainID": "X_bSECsnvCSHHR44lXWMDOYDiZpbTUzqnQFyf_pqDq-JjXxXJCv_jQmSOLhD3e3A==",
    "Email": "me@protonmail.com",
    "Send": 0,
    "Status": 1,
    "Type": 1,
    "Receive": 0,
    "Order": 1,
    "DisplayName": "hi",
    "Signature": "signature",
    "HasKeys": 0,
    "Keys": []
  },
  "Code": 1000
}

      Setup new non-subuser address
      POST/addresses/setup

      Attributes ¶

      • Domain (string) - protonmail domain

        "Domain": "protonmail.com"

      • DisplayName: optional, default empty

        "DisplayName": "hi"

      • Signature: optional, default empty

        "Signature": "signature"

      Response ¶

      • Status (integer) - 0 is disabled, 1 is enabled, can be set by user

      • Type (integer) - 1 is original PM, 2 is PM alias, 3 is custom domain address

      • Receive (integer) - 1 is active address (Status=1 and has key), 0 is inactive (cannot send or receive)

      • DisplayName (string) - optional, default empty

      • Signature (string) - optional, default empty

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/addresses
      Requestsexample
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Access: application/vnd.protonmail.api+json;apiversion=0
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Addresses": [
    {
      "ID": "qmhrlFY24BhSHiFplF0B7G_cMVLi1sokaWIhfNaee6dRtdIZPYnqgI4-MpAb8h3JhOOykKv8ZsuTH8X_SrUZSg==",
      "DomainID": "l8vWAXHBQmv0u7OVtPbcqMa4iwQaBqowINSQjPrxAr-Da8fVPKUkUcqAq30_BCxj1X0nW70HQRmAa-rIvzmKUA==",
      "Email": "jason@protonmail.dev",
      "Send": 1,
      "Receive": 1,
      "Status": 1,
      "Type": 1,
      "Order": 1,
      "DisplayName": "D L'u, P.D. 定超",
      "Signature": "hi there",
      "HasKeys": 1,
      "Keys": [
        {
          "ID": "IlnTbqicN-2HfUGIn-ki8bqZfLqNj5ErUB0z24Qx5g-4NvrrIc6GLvEpj2EPfwGDv28aKYVRRrSgEFhR_zhlkA==",
          "Version": 3,
          "Flags": 3,
          "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
          "Fingerprint": "c93f767df53b0ca8395cfde90483475164ec6353",
          "Activation": null,
          "Primary": 1
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "ID": "_pm5NXefHCdfqXuHiQ_zcOsfC4rGaCwV4lxuJt5qCmZBh4RiQ0k5iA8wLLaphTWHWAETz-WDqjLDRXNWftciXw==",
      "DomainID": "l8vWAXHBQmv0u7OVtPbcqMa4iwQaBqowINSQjPrxAr-Da8fVPKUkUcqAq30_BCxj1X0nW70HQRmAa-rIvzmKUA==",
      "Email": "hi@protonmail.dev",
      "Send": 1,
      "Receive": 0,
      "Status": 0,
      "Type": 2,
      "Order": 2,
      "DisplayName": "hi",
      "Signature": "hi there",
      "HasKeys": 0,
      "Keys": []
    }
  ]
}

      Get Addresses
      GET/addresses

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      Page
      integer (optional) Default: 0 Example: 0

      the page index

      PageSize
      integer (optional) Default: 150 Example: 150

      the page size, maximum 150

      Address ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/addresses/lKJlejjlk==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Access: application/vnd.protonmail.api+json;apiversion=0
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Address": {
    "ID": "qmhrlFY24BhSHiFplF0B7G_cMVLi1sokaWIhfNaee6dRtdIZPYnqgI4-MpAb8h3JhOOykKv8ZsuTH8X_SrUZSg==",
    "DomainID": "l8vWAXHBQmv0u7OVtPbcqMa4iwQaBqowINSQjPrxAr-Da8fVPKUkUcqAq30_BCxj1X0nW70HQRmAa-rIvzmKUA==",
    "Email": "jason@protonmail.dev",
    "Send": 1,
    "Receive": 1,
    "Status": 1,
    "Type": 1,
    "Order": 1,
    "DisplayName": "D L'u, P.D. 定超",
    "Signature": "hi there",
    "HasKeys": 1,
    "Keys": [
      {
        "ID": "IlnTbqicN-2HfUGIn-ki8bqZfLqNj5ErUB0z24Qx5g-4NvrrIc6GLvEpj2EPfwGDv28aKYVRRrSgEFhR_zhlkA==",
        "Version": 3,
        "Flags": 3,
        "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
        "Fingerprint": "c93f767df53b0ca8395cfde90483475164ec6353",
        "Activation": null,
        "Primary": 1
      }
    ]
  }
}

      Get Address
      GET/addresses/{address_id}

      Get a single address.

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      address_id
      "string" (required) Example: lKJlejjlk==

      the encrypted id

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/addresses/lKJlejjlk==
      Requestsupdate display name and signatureuse defaults
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "DisplayName": "hi",
  "Signature": "signature"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Access: application/vnd.protonmail.api+json;apiversion=0
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "DisplayName": "",
  "Signature": ""
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Access: application/vnd.protonmail.api+json;apiversion=0
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Update address
      PUT/addresses/{address_id}

      Update display name and/or signature.

      Attributes ¶

      • DisplayName: optional

        "DisplayName": "hi"

      • Signature: optional

        "Signature": "signature"
      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      address_id
      "string" (required) Example: lKJlejjlk==

      the encrypted id

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/addresses/lKJlejjlk==/enable
      Requestsexample
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Access: application/vnd.protonmail.api+json;apiversion=0
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Enable Address
      PUT/addresses/{address_id}/enable

      Locked route

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      address_id
      "string" (required) Example: lKJlejjlk==

      the encrypted id

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/addresses/lKJlejjlk==/disable
      Requestsexample
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Access: application/vnd.protonmail.api+json;apiversion=0
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Disable Address
      PUT/addresses/{address_id}/disable

      Locked route

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      address_id
      "string" (required) Example: lKJlejjlk==

      the encrypted id

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/addresses/lKJlejjlk==
      Requestsexample
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Access: application/vnd.protonmail.api+json;apiversion=0
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete a Disabled Address
      DELETE/addresses/{address_id}

      Locked route

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      address_id
      "string" (required) Example: lKJlejjlk==

      the encrypted id

      VPN Admin ¶

      Get VPN Logical Server Info ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/admin/vpn/logicals
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "LogicalServers": [
    {
      "ID": 1234,
      "Name": "ES#1",
      "Region": null,
      "City": null,
      "EntryCountry": "ES",
      "ExitCountry": "ES",
      "Domain": "es-05.protonvpn.com",
      "DisplayTier": 2,
      "Tier": 2,
      "Visible": 1,
      "Features": 0,
      "Servers": [
        {
          "ID": 1063,
          "ServicesDown": 8,
          "Bytes": 30440,
          "LoadUpdateTime": 1510953284,
          "EntryIP": "95.215.61.163",
          "ExitIP": "95.215.61.164",
          "Domain": "es-04.protonvpn.com",
          "MaxSpeed": 26214400,
          "Load": 32,
          "Enabled": 1
        }
      ],
      "Load": 0,
      "Location": {
        "Lat": 39.4667,
        "Long": -0.3667
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Get array of VPN logical server information
      GET/admin/vpn/logicals

      Get VPN Server Info ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/admin/vpn/servers
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Servers": [
    {
      "ID": 1063,
      "ServicesDown": 8,
      "Bytes": 30440,
      "LoadUpdateTime": 1510953284,
      "EntryIP": "95.215.61.163",
      "ExitIP": "95.215.61.164",
      "Domain": "es-04.protonvpn.com",
      "MaxSpeed": 26214400,
      "Load": 32,
      "Enabled": 1
    }
  ]
}

      Get array of VPN server information
      GET/admin/vpn/servers

      Create Logical Server ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/admin/vpn/logicals
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Name": "ES#1",
  "Domain": "es-05.protonvpn.com",
  "Region": null,
  "City": null,
  "EntryCountry": "ES",
  "ExitCountry": "ES",
  "Location": {
    "Lat": 39.4667,
    "Long": -0.3667
  },
  "Tier": 1,
  "DisplayTier": 2,
  "ServerIDs": [
    1063
  ],
  "Features": 0,
  "Visible": 1
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "LogicalServer": {
    "ID": 1234,
    "Name": "ES#1",
    "Region": null,
    "City": null,
    "EntryCountry": "ES",
    "ExitCountry": "ES",
    "Domain": "es-05.protonvpn.com",
    "DisplayTier": 2,
    "Tier": 1,
    "Visible": 1,
    "Features": 0,
    "Servers": [
      {
        "ID": 1063,
        "ServicesDown": 8,
        "Bytes": 30440,
        "LoadUpdateTime": 1510953284,
        "EntryIP": "95.215.61.163",
        "ExitIP": "95.215.61.164",
        "Domain": "es-04.protonvpn.com",
        "MaxSpeed": 26214400,
        "Load": 32,
        "Enabled": 1
      }
    ],
    "Load": 0,
    "Location": {
      "Lat": 39.4667,
      "Long": -0.3667
    }
  }
}

      Create Logical Server
      POST/admin/vpn/logicals

      Create Server ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/admin/vpn/servers
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "EntryIP": "95.215.61.163",
  "ExitIP": "95.215.61.164",
  "Domain": "es-04.protonvpn.com",
  "Enabled": 1
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Server": {
    "ID": 1063,
    "ServicesDown": 8,
    "Bytes": 30440,
    "LoadUpdateTime": 1510953284,
    "EntryIP": "95.215.61.163",
    "ExitIP": "95.215.61.164",
    "Domain": "es-04.protonvpn.com",
    "MaxSpeed": 26214400,
    "Load": 32,
    "Enabled": 1
  }
}

      Create Server
      POST/admin/vpn/servers

      Update Logical Server ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/admin/vpn/logicals/
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Name": "ES#1",
  "Region": null,
  "City": null,
  "Domain": "es-05.protonvpn.com",
  "EntryCountry": "ES",
  "ExitCountry": "ES",
  "Location": {
    "Lat": 39.4667,
    "Long": -0.3667
  },
  "Tier": 1,
  "DisplayTier": 2,
  "ServerIDs": [
    1063
  ],
  "Features": 0,
  "Visible": 1
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "LogicalServer": {
    "ID": 1234,
    "Name": "ES#1",
    "Region": null,
    "City": null,
    "EntryCountry": "ES",
    "ExitCountry": "ES",
    "Domain": "es-05.protonvpn.com",
    "DisplayTier": 3,
    "Tier": 2,
    "Visible": 1,
    "Features": 0,
    "Servers": [
      {
        "ID": 1063,
        "ServicesDown": 8,
        "Bytes": 30440,
        "LoadUpdateTime": 1510953284,
        "EntryIP": "95.215.61.163",
        "ExitIP": "95.215.61.164",
        "Domain": "es-04.protonvpn.com",
        "MaxSpeed": 26214400,
        "Load": 32,
        "Enabled": 1
      }
    ],
    "Load": 0,
    "Location": {
      "Lat": 39.4667,
      "Long": -0.3667
    }
  }
}

      Update Logical Server
      PUT/admin/vpn/logicals/

      Update Server ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/admin/vpn/servers/
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "EntryIP": "95.215.61.163",
  "ExitIP": "95.215.61.164",
  "Domain": "es-04.protonvpn.com",
  "Enabled": 1
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Server": {
    "ID": 1063,
    "ServicesDown": 8,
    "Bytes": 30440,
    "LoadUpdateTime": 1510953284,
    "EntryIP": "95.215.61.163",
    "ExitIP": "95.215.61.164",
    "Domain": "es-04.protonvpn.com",
    "MaxSpeed": 26214400,
    "Load": 32,
    "Enabled": 1
  }
}

      Update Server
      PUT/admin/vpn/servers/

      Delete Logical Server ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/admin/vpn/logicals/
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete Logical Server
      DELETE/admin/vpn/logicals/

      Delete Server ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/admin/vpn/servers/
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete Server
      DELETE/admin/vpn/servers/

      Attachments ¶

      Get Attachment ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/attachments/
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: */*
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Disposition: attachment; filename = "Issue 4.png"
      Content-Type: image/png
      Content-Length: 1532
      Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary
      Body
      {binary_file_content_or_encrypted_data_packet}

      Get an attachment by ID
      GET/attachments/{attachmentID}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      attachmentID
      "string" (required) Example: <encrypted attachment id>

      Upload Attachment ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/attachments
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      ----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Filename"

test.txt
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="MessageID"

ASDkjhasdSAJhasdasdASD==
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="MIMEType"

text/plain
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="ContentID" // Empty string or missing is no ContentID

abcdef@domain.com
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="KeyPackets"; filename="temp1"
Content-Type: application/octet-stream

{binary asymmetric key packet}

----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="DataPacket"; filename="temp2"
Content-Type: application/octet-stream

{encrypted data packet}

----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Signature"; filename="temp3"
Content-Type: application/octet-stream

{optional binary signature packet(s)}

----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Attachment": {
        "ID":"I6hgx3Ol_sdfAs832J2==",
        "Name":"test.txt",
        "Size": 1503,
        "MIMEType":"text\/plain",
        "KeyPackets":"wcBMA6rw6TH9oRKuAQf\/Q3scaoBPjn710+EhfiIP0jF2udWfZ4Thv9TCiaolRMMhivqBpOoeFuyVi6\/LqpibLeVu3karg7zvFTFb+97eWF8ZP8cg8pPjyP4QRclZ4v1hfF1G6Tlw5L3TWt9j5WeMpinjJ3MY0df9WUzf9u+c7AoKNUsfuXHQ4o2ry94ccVYLfm13dw2gEkHxqMkwJ+SHR7vuKADl1EQUzkYjq7+pF3xje4Wwr0Xg+GAcOBQVUcQ3tkbvwZq3\/qxhavP5Pdlei\/8BGUreWQVicKFY5yW3nz+RgHkwqKNwdRnjr1mcFStv45oEicAcccb72FyXuHrhbAzoBmJT2ngQMxUS9+ZsTg==",
        "Headers": { },
        "Signature": "-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----.*-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----" // or null
    }
}

      Upload an attachment to a draft message
      POST/attachments

      Update Signature ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/attachments//signature
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Signature" : "-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----.*-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----" // or null
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Update an attachment's signature on a draft message
      PUT/attachments/{attachmentID}/signature

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      attachmentID
      "string" (required) Example: <encrypted attachment id>

      Delete Attachment ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/attachments/
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete an attachment from a draft message
      DELETE/attachments/{attachmentID}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      attachmentID
      "string" (required) Example: <encrypted attachment id>

      Authentication ¶

      Auth ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/auth
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientID": "demoapp",
    "ClientSecret": "demopass", //only required for admin panel
    "Username": "user_name",
    "ClientEphemeral" : <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof" : <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_key>,
    "TwoFactorCode": 123456, //either this, the U2F object, or nothing if 2FA is disabled
    "U2F": {
        "KeyHandle" : <aKeyHandle>,
        "ClientData": "1046-length string",
        "SignatureData": "theSignatureData"
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "AccessToken": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
    "ExpiresIn": 360000,
    "TokenType": "Bearer",
    "Scope": "full <other_scopes>", // Full access with decrypted AccessToken
    "UID": "6f3c4f52cf499c2066e6c5669a293177c1f43755",
    "RefreshToken": "aafe30367aa7dc09bf5c42d15a93e6c57270fe6f",
    "UserStatus": 13,
    "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
    "KeySalt": <base64_encodeed_salt>,
    "EventID":"ACXDmTaBub14w==", // first client event ID, send with first request for events
    "ServerProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "PasswordMode": 2
}

      Authenticate
      POST/auth

      Refresh ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/auth/refresh
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "ResponseType": "token",
  "ClientID": "demoapp",
  "GrantType": "refresh_token",
  "RefreshToken": "eaad5a7059835aac32c0bf99c2e208a59b8c1a55",
  "UID": "6f3c4f52cf499c2066e6c5669a293177c1f43755",
  "RedirectURI": "http://protonmail.ch",
  "State": "random_string"
}
      Responses200200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "AccessToken": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
    "ExpiresIn": 360000,
    "TokenType": "Bearer",
    "Scope": "full <other_scopes_here>", // Full access with decrypted AccessToken
    "UID": "e5358d5c2352650c801fdf533fc5c61308b52430",
    "UserStatus": null,
    "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
    "RefreshToken": "b894b4c4f20003f12d486900d8b88c7d68e67235"
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "AccessToken": "8a2575fad8788d253543957073d494c86f22f829", // Decrypted if reset scope or no keys set up
    "ExpiresIn": 360000,
    "TokenType": "Bearer",
    "Scope": "reset", // Can only be used to reset mailbox password
    "UID": "e5358d5c2352650c801fdf533fc5c61308b52430",
    "UserStatus": null,
    "RefreshToken": "b894b4c4f20003f12d486900d8b88c7d68e67235"
}

      Refresh an expired token
      POST/auth/refresh

      Set Cookies ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/auth/cookies
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "ResponseType": "token",
  "ClientID": "demoapp",
  "GrantType": "refresh_token",
  "RefreshToken": "eaad5a7059835aac32c0bf99c2e208a59b8c1a55",
  "UID": "6f3c4f52cf499c2066e6c5669a293177c1f43755",
  "RedirectURI": "http://protonmail.ch",
  "State": "random_string"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "UID": "3f33a926677e5cf429db2dc7fee519a1"
}

      Set secure cookies, web app only
      POST/auth/cookies

      Authentication Info ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/auth/info
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "ClientID": "demoapp",
  "ClientSecret": "demopass",
  "Username": "user_name"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Modulus": "-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----*-----END SIGNATURE-----",
    "ServerEphemeral": <base64_encoded_server_ephemeral>,
    "Version": 4,
    "Salt": <base64_encoded_salt>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_key>,
    "TwoFactor": 1, // deprecated
    "2FA": {
        "TOTP" : 1,
        "U2F" : {
            "Challenge": "a43lengthStringAndUnique",
            "RegisteredKeys": [{
                "Version": "U2F_V2",
                "KeyHandle":<aKeyHandle>
            }]
        }
    }
}

      Set up SRP authentication request
      POST/auth/info

      Authentication Modulus ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/auth/modulus
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Modulus": "-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----",
  "ModulusID": "Oq_JB_IkrOx5WlpxzlRPocN3_NhJ80V7DGav77eRtSDkOtLxW2jfI3nUpEqANGpboOyN-GuzEFXadlpxgVp7_g=="
}

      Get random SRP modulus
      GET/auth/modulus

      Get Sessions ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/auth/sessions
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Sessions": [
        {
            "UID": "cc0a3ec21c3af3461c9c310bf3f568795fdf6dc5",
            "ClientID": "Web",
            "CreateTime": 1527262849,
            "MemberID": "IhcUWoRxdY3S-6pfk2L1oSTeZx5kvpeqcxuii8h1ic1nYnSJa11LP8DABcgsRJCwXXDjxwPFSxEGJrlrvMWFpQ==",
            "Revocable": 0
        },
        {
            "UID": "1c48fc422e50d64f5a55fb218cd3dc49e661b49e",
            "ClientID": "Web",
            "CreateTime": 1527350133,
            "MemberID": null,
            "Revocable: 1
        }
    ]
}

      Get active sessions
      GET/auth/sessions

      Revoke ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/auth
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Revoke a token
      DELETE/auth

      Revoke Session ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/auth/sessions/
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Revoke a session by UID, locked
      DELETE/auth/sessions/

      Revoke Others ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/auth/sessions
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Revoke all other access tokens, locked
      DELETE/auth/sessions

      Betas ¶

      Get beta registration ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/betas/iOSVPN
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {session_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Beta": {
        "ClientID": "iOSVPN",
        "Email" : "john@exampl.com", // may be null
        "CreateTime": 1538416904,
        "ModifyTime": 1538416904
    }
}

      Get a specific beta registration
      GET/betas/{clientid}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      clientid
      "string" (required) Example: iOSVPN

      the client ID

      Get beta registrations ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/betas
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {session_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Betas": [
        {
            "ClientID": "iOSVPN",
            "Email" : "john@exampl.com", // may be null
            "CreateTime": 1538416904,
            "ModifyTime": 1538416904
        }
    ]
}

      Get all beta registrations
      GET/betas

      Create or update beta registration ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/betas/iOSVPN
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {session_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Email": "john@example.com" // Only required for some betas
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Beta": {
        "ClientID": "iOSVPN",
        "Email" : "john@exampl.com", // may be null
        "CreateTime": 1538416904,
        "ModifyTime": 1538416904
    }
}

      Create or update beta registration
      PUT/betas/{clientid}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      clientid
      "string" (required) Example: iOSVPN

      the client ID

      Delete beta registration ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/betas/iOSVPN
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {session_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete a specific beta registration
      DELETE/betas/{clientid}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      clientid
      "string" (required) Example: iOSVPN

      the client ID

      Delete beta registrations ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/betas
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {session_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete all beta registrations
      DELETE/betas

      Contacts ¶

      Get Contacts ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/contacts?0&1000&LKJLalkfejl==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Contacts": [                               // Contacts are ordered by Name
        {
            "ID": "a29olIjFv0rnXxBhSMw==",      // Contact.ContactID
            "Name": "ProtonMail Features",
            "UID": "proton-legacy-4bcd0f7f-acb8-4d27-9793-91adfd90750f",
            "Size": 0,
            "CreateTime": 1503815366,
            "ModifyTime": 1503815366,
            "LabelIDs": [
                "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w=="
            ]
        },
        {
            "ID": "3N_6L-i2CMwWWSV6Pw==",
            "Name": "zzBob",
            "UID": "proton-legacy-690d179c-3a23-4666-9010-2164e6d82492",
            "Size": 0,
            "CreateTime": 1503815366,
            "ModifyTime": 1503815366,
            "LabelIDs": []
        }
    ],
    "Total": 2 // Total number of contacts
}

      Get a list of contacts minus their data for when user visits the contact page
      GET/contacts?{Page,PageSize,LabelID}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      Page
      integer (optional) Default: 0 Example: 0

      the page index

      PageSize
      integer (optional) Default: 1000 Example: 1000

      the page size, maximum 1000

      LabelID
      string (optional) Example: LKJLalkfejl==

      label to filter on

      Get Contact Export ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/contacts/export0&50&LKJLalkfejl==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Contacts": [                           // Contacts are not in any order
        {
            "ID": "afefafernXxBhSMw==",     // Contact.ContactID
            "Cards": [
                {
                    "Type": 3, // 0 for cleartext, 1 for encrypted only (not used), 2 for signed, 3 for both
                    "Data": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
                    "Signature": "-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----.*-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----"
                },
                {
                    "Type": 2,
                    "Data": "BEGIN:VCARD\r\nVERSION:4.0\r\nPRODID:-//ProtonMail//ProtonMail vCard 1.0.0//EN\r\nFN:Test\r\nUID:proton-legacy-139892c2-f691-4118-8c29-061196013e04\r\nitem1.EMAIL;PREF=1:test@protonmail.dev\r\nEND:VCARD\r\n",
                    "Signature": "-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----.*-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----"
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "ID": "jhuafesr2srgaefSMw==",
            "Cards": [
                {
                    "Type": 0,
                    "Data": "BEGIN:VCARD\r\nVERSION:4.0\r\nPRODID:-//ProtonMail//ProtonMail vCard 1.0.0//EN\r\nFN:ProtonMail Security\r\nUID:proton-legacy-139892c2-f692-4118-8c29-061196013e04\r\nitem1.EMAIL;PREF=1:security@protonmail.dev\r\nEND:VCARD\r\n",
                    "Signature": null
                }
            ]
        }
    ],
    "Total": 2 // Total number of contacts
}

      Get all contacts for export
      GET/contacts/export{Page,PageSize,LabelID}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      Page
      integer (optional) Default: 0 Example: 0

      the page index

      PageSize
      integer (optional) Default: 50 Example: 50

      the page size, maximum 50

      LabelID
      string (optional) Example: LKJLalkfejl==

      label to filter on

      Get Contact ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/contacts/ACXDmTaBub14w==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Contact": {
        "ID": "a29olIjFv0rnXxBhSMw==",
        "Name": "ProtonMail Features",
        "UID": "proton-legacy-139892c2-f691-4118-8c29-061196013e04",
        "Size": 1234,
        "CreateTime": 1503815366,
        "ModifyTime": 1503815366,
        "ContactEmails": [
            {
                "ID": "aefew4323jFv0BhSMw==",   // ContactList.ContactID
                "Email": "features@protonmail.black",
                "Type": ["work"],
                "Defaults": 1,                 // ignore for now, future feature
                "Order": 1,
                "ContactID": "a29olIjFv0rnXxBhSMw==",
                "LabelIDs": [                   // Groups
                    "afeaefaefaef==",
                    "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w=="
                ]
            },
            {
                "ID": "dbdvrafejFv0BhSMw==",
                "Email": "features@protonmail.ch",
                "Type": ["home"],
                "Defaults": 1,
                "Order": 2,
                "ContactID": "a29olIjFv0rnXxBhSMw==",
                "LabelIDs": []
            }
        ],
        "LabelIDs": [                           // Labels on Contact, ignore, maybe future feature
            "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w=="
        ],
        "Cards": [
            {
                "Type": 3, // 0 for cleartext, 1 for encrypted only (not used), 2 for signed, 3 for both
                "Data": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
                "Signature": "-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----.*-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----"
            },
            {
                "Type": 2,
                "Data": "BEGIN:VCARD\r\nVERSION:4.0\r\nPRODID:-//ProtonMail//ProtonMail vCard 1.0.0//EN\r\nFN:ProtonMail Features\r\nUID:proton-legacy-139892c2-f691-4118-8c29-061196013e04\r\nitem1.EMAIL;TYPE=work;PREF=1:features@protonmail.black\r\nitem2.EMAIL;TYPE=home;PREF=2:features@protonmail.ch\r\nEND:VCARD\r\n",
                "Signature": "-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----.*-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----"
            }
        ]
    }
}

      Get full Contact
      GET/contacts/{contactid}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      contactid
      "string" (required) Example: ACXDmTaBub14w==

      the ContactID

      Add Contacts ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/contacts
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Contacts": [
        {
            "Cards": [
                {
                    "Type": 3, // encrypted and signed, optional
                    "Data": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
                    "Signature": "-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----.*-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----"
                },
                {
                    "Type": 2, // Signed, required, can only include VERSION, PRODID, FN, UID, EMAIL. FN and UID required, EMAILs optional, but must have vCard group
                    "Data": "BEGIN:VCARD\r\nVERSION:4.0\r\nFN:ProtonMail Features\r\nUID:proton-legacy-139892c2-f691-4118-8c29-061196013e04\r\nitem1.EMAIL;TYPE=work;PREF=1:features@protonmail.black\r\nitem2.EMAIL;TYPE=home;PREF=2:features@protonmail.ch\r\nEND:VCARD\r\n",
                    "Signature": "-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----.*-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----"
                },
                {
                    "Type": 0, // Unsigned, can only include VERSION, PRODID, CATEGORIES
                    "Data": "BEGIN:VCARD\r\nVERSION:4.0\r\nitem1.CATEGORIES:MyLabelName1,MyLabelName2\r\nEND:VCARD\r\n",
                    "Signature": null
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "Cards": [
                {
                    "Type": 2, // Signed, required
                    "Data": "BEGIN:VCARDr\nVERSION:4.0\r\nPRODID:-//ProtonMail//ProtonMail vCard 1.0.0//EN\r\nFN:ProtonMail Security\r\nUID:proton-legacy-139892c2-f692-4118-8c29-061196013e04\r\nitem1.EMAIL;PREF=1:security@protonmail.dev\r\nEND:VCARD\r\n",
                    "Signature": "-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----.*-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----"
                }
            ]
        }
    ],
    "Overwrite": 1, // when UID conflict, 0 = error, 1 = overwrite
    "Labels": 1 // add labels (CATEGORIES) if present, import will fail if label does not exist
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code" : 1001,
    "Responses" : [
        {
            "Index": 0,
            "Response" : {
                "Code": 1000,
                "Contact": {
                    "ID": "a29olIjFv0rnXxBhSMw==",
                    "Name": "ProtonMail Features",
                    "UID": "proton-legacy-139892c2-f691-4118-8c29-061196013e04",
                    "Size": 1434,
                    "CreateTime": 1503815366,
                    "ModifyTime": 1503815366,
                    "ContactEmails": [
                        {
                            "ID": "aefew4323jFv0BhSMw==",   // ContactList.ContactID
                            "Email": "features@protonmail.black",
                            "Type": ["work"],
                            "Defaults": 1,                 // ignore for now, future feature
                            "Order": 1,
                            "ContactID": "a29olIjFv0rnXxBhSMw==",
                            "LabelIDs": [                   // Groups
                                "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w=="
                            ]
                        },
                        {
                            "ID": "dbdvrafejFv0BhSMw==",
                            "Email": "features@protonmail.ch",
                            "Type": ["home"],
                            "Defaults": 1,
                            "Order": 2,
                            "ContactID": "a29olIjFv0rnXxBhSMw==",
                            "LabelIDs": []
                        }
                    ],
                    "LabelIDs": [                           // Labels on Contact, ignore, maybe future feature
                        "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w=="
                    ]
                }
            }
        },
        {
            "Index": 1,
            "Response": {
                "Code": 1000,
                "Contact": {
                    "ID": "jhuafesr2srgaefSMw==",
                    "Name": "ProtonMail Security",
                    "UID": "proton-legacy-4bcd0f7f-acb6-4d27-9793-91adfd90750f",
                    "Size": 1234,
                    "CreateTime": 1503815366,
                    "ModifyTime": 1503815366,
                    "ContactEmails": [
                        {
                            "ID": "aefew4323jFv0BhSMw==",   // ContactList.ContactID
                            "Email": "security@protonmail.dev",
                            "Type": [],
                            "Defaults": 1,                 // ignore for now, future feature
                            "Order": 1,
                            "ContactID": "jhuafesr2srgaefSMw==",
                            "LabelIDs": []                   // Groups
                        }
                    ],
                    "LabelIDs": []
                }
            }
        }
    ]
}

      Create new contacts
      POST/contacts

      Update Contact ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/contacts/?contact_id=lKJlejjlk==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Cards": [
        {
            "Type": 2, // Signed, required
            "Data": "BEGIN:VCARDr\nVERSION:4.0\r\nPRODID:-//ProtonMail//ProtonMail vCard 1.0.0//EN\r\nFN:ProtonMail Security\r\nUID:proton-legacy-139892c2-f692-4118-8c29-061196013e04\r\nitem1.EMAIL;PREF=1:security@protonmail.dev\r\nEND:VCARD\r\n",
            "Signature": "-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----.*-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----"
        }
    ]
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Contact": {
        "ID": "jhuafesr2srgaefSMw==",
        "Name": "ProtonMail Security",
        "UID": "proton-legacy-4bcd0f7f-acb6-4d27-9793-91adfd90750f",
        "Size": 1234,
        "CreateTime": 1503815366,
        "ModifyTime": 1503815366,
        "ContactEmails": [
            {
                "ID": "aefew4323jFv0BhSMw==",   // ContactList.ContactID
                "Email": "security@protonmail.dev",
                "Type": [],
                "Defaults": 1,                 // ignore for now, future feature
                "Order": 1,
                "ContactID": "jhuafesr2srgaefSMw==",
                "LabelIDs": []                   // Groups
            }
        ],
        "LabelIDs": []
    }
}

      Update a contact
      PUT/contacts/{?contact_id}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      contact_id
      "string" (required) Example: lKJlejjlk==

      the encrypted ContactID

      Label contacts ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/contacts/label
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "LabelID" : "ALKJLjalfjl==",    // Label's type must be Contact
    "ContactIDs" : [
        "LKJLalkfejl==",
        "ASia83sJaL=="
    ]
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "LKJLalkfejl==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "ASia83sJaL==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Label an array of contacts
      PUT/contacts/label

      Unlabel contacts ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/contacts/unlabel
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "LabelID" : "ALKJLjalfjl==",    // Label's type must be Contact
    "ContactIDs" : [
        "LKJLalkfejl==",
        "ASia83sJaL=="
    ]
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "LKJLalkfejl==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "ASia83sJaL==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Unlabel an array of contacts
      PUT/contacts/unlabel

      Delete Contacts ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/contacts/delete
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "IDs": [
        "gD7tqQFumWuP0P3Jxu_IYoNLsh6CbixlCAnuXbbwnTTUlhTJ5WRDQHk1MnphQQ6IR06W74RxTF-ZSWWjcds8ZA==",  //ContactID's
        "xAUc9Wt2C2TEf7810SHO49BHGxz7xZMBcuBQZpyj9dG-kcevbCMr3rlsjMuUOHXMNQhd_QLeLVy0YKIe-vwUIQ=="
    ]
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "gD7tqQFumWuP0P3Jxu_IYoNLsh6CbixlCAnuXbbwnTTUlhTJ5WRDQHk1MnphQQ6IR06W74RxTF-ZSWWjcds8ZA==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "xAUc9Wt2C2TEf7810SHO49BHGxz7xZMBcuBQZpyj9dG-kcevbCMr3rlsjMuUOHXMNQhd_QLeLVy0YKIe-vwUIQ==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 13043,
        "Error": "Contact does not exist",
        "Details": {}
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Delete array of contacts
      PUT/contacts/delete

      Clear Contacts ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/contacts
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete all contacts
      DELETE/contacts

      Get Contact Emails ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/contacts/emails?0&1000&user@example.com&LKJLalkfejl==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "ContactEmails": [ // Contacts are in order of decreasing priority
        {
            "ID": "afefafernXxBhSMw==",     // ContactList.ContactID
            "Name": "ProtonMail Features",
            "Email": "features@protonmail.black",
            "Type": ["work"],
            "Defaults": 1,                 // ignore for now, future feature
            "Order": 1,                    // priority of this email for this ContactID
            "ContactID": "gD7tqQFumWuP0P3Jxu_IYo==",
            "LabelIDs": [                    // Groups
                "afeaefaefaef==",
                "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w=="
            ]
        },
        {
            "ID": "ertCMwWWSV6Pw==",
            "Name": "Bob",
            "Email": "derp@derp.com",
            "Type": [],
            "Defaults": 1,
            "Order": 2,
            "ContactID": "gD7tqQFumWuP0P3Jxu_IYo==",
            "LabelIDs": []
        }
    ],
    "Total": 2 // Total number of contact emails
}

      Get a list of contact emails
      GET/contacts/emails?{Page,PageSize,Email,LabelID}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      Page
      integer (optional) Default: 0 Example: 0

      the page index

      PageSize
      integer (optional) Default: 1000 Example: 1000

      the page size, maximum 1000

      Email
      string (optional) Example: user@example.com

      email to filter on, cannot be used with LabelID

      LabelID
      string (optional) Example: LKJLalkfejl==

      label to filter on, cannot be used with Email

      Label contact emails ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/contacts/emails/label
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "LabelID" : "ALKJLjalfjl==",    // Label's type must be Contact
    "ContactEmailIDs" : [
        "LKJLalkfejl==",
        "ASia83sJaL=="
    ]
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "LKJLalkfejl==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "ASia83sJaL==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Label an array of ContactEmails
      PUT/contacts/emails/label

      Unlabel contact emails ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/contacts/emails/unlabel
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "LabelID" : "ALKJLjalfjl==",    // Label's type must be Contact
    "ContactEmailIDs" : [
        "LKJLalkfejl==",
        "ASia83sJaL=="
    ]
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "LKJLalkfejl==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "ASia83sJaL==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Unlabel an array of ContactEmails
      PUT/contacts/emails/unlabel

      Conversations ¶

      Get Conversations ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/conversations?0&0&50&Limit&&1&1433807257&1433807257&&&cheese&cheese&cheese&cheese&1&1&1&&
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Total": 76,
    "Conversations": [
        {
            "ID": "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w==",
            "Order": 675,
            "Subject": "Testing",
            "Senders": [
                {
                  "Address": "derp@derp.com",
                  "Name": "John Smith"
                }
            ],
            "Recipients": [
                {
                    "Address": "jason@protonmail.email",
                    "Name": ""
                }
            ],
            "NumMessages": 5,
            "NumUnread": 0,
            "NumAttachments": 0,
            "ExpirationTime": 0, // If non-zero, earliest expiration time in conversation
            "TotalSize": 3555,
            "AddressID": "AJuSqm0qvIL4LSMR9LWsqNOa2OlAU_Iqr2Qcducsz-ZA==",
            "LabelIDs": [
                "0", // Inbox
                "10", // Starred
                "G5LuBhyf5dezEmhqiTNhqP1G3ZR8cxeyzU9oxAOcuwKyHng06rbg==" // User label
            ],
            "Labels": [
                {
                    "ID": "0", // Inbox
                    "NumUnread" : 0,
                    "NumMessages": 5
                },
                {
                    "ID": "10", // Starred
                    "NumUnread" : 0,
                    "NumMessages": 1
                },
                {
                    "ID": "G5LuBhyf5dezEmhqiTNhqP1G3ZR8cxeyzU9oxAOcuwKyHng06rbg==", // User label
                    "NumUnread" : 0,
                    "NumMessages": 1
                }
            ],
            "Time": "1418736382" // Latest message time in conversation MATCHING FILTER, can change based on query!
        }
    ]
}

      Get a list of conversations
      GET/conversations?{Location,Page,PageSize,Limit,LabelID,Desc,Begin,End,BeginID,EndID,Keyword,To,From,Subject,Attachments,Starred,Unread,AddressID,ID}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      Location
      integer (optional) Example: 0

      message location 0 => Inbox, 1 => Draft, 2 => Outbox, 3 => Trash, 4 => Spam, 6 => Archive

      Choices: 0 1 2 3 4 6

      Page
      integer (optional) Default: 0 Example: 0

      the page index

      PageSize
      integer (optional) Default: 50 Example: 50

      the page size, maximum 150

      Limit
      integer (optional) Default: 50 

      the number of conversations to return, defaults to page size (1 page), maximum 150

      LabelID
      string (optional) Example: <encrypted_label_id>

      label to filter on

      Desc
      integer (optional) Default: 1 Example: 1

      0 => ASC, 1 => DESC

      Choices: 0 1

      Begin
      integer (optional) Example: 1433807257

      UNIX timestamp to filter conversations earlier than timestamp

      End
      integer (optional) Example: 1433807257

      UNIX timestamp to filter conversations later than timestamp

      BeginID
      string (optional) Example: <encrypted_message_id>

      return only conversations newer, in creation time (NOT timestamp), than BeginID if timestamp = Begin

      EndID
      string (optional) Example: <encrypted_message_id>

      return only conversations older, in creation time (NOT timestamp), than EndID if timestamp = End

      Keyword
      string (optional) Example: cheese

      Keyword search of To, CC, BCC, From, Subject

      To
      string (optional) Example: cheese

      Keyword search of To, CC, BCC

      From
      string (optional) Example: cheese

      Keyword search of From

      Subject
      string (optional) Example: cheese

      Keyword search of Subject

      Attachments
      integer (optional) Example: 1

      1 => at least one attachment(s)

      Choices: 1

      Starred
      integer (optional) Example: 1

      1 => at least one starred message

      Choices: 1

      Unread
      integer (optional) Example: 1

      1 => at least one unread message

      Choices: 1

      AddressID
      string (optional) Example: <encrypted_address_id>

      address to filter on

      ID
      string or array (optional) Example: <encrypted_conv_id>

      conversation ID(s) to filter on

      AutoWildcard
      integet (optional) Example: 1

      automatically convert simple queries to wildcarded versions, such as ‘test’ to ’test’

      Get Conversation ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/conversations/ACXDmTaBub14w==?
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Conversation": {
        "ID": "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w==",
        "Order": 678,
        "Subject": "Re: Checking in",
        "Senders": [
            {
                "Address": "example@example.com",
                "Name": "Example McExample"
            }
        ],
        "Recipients": [
            {
                "Address": "jason@protonmail.ch",
                "Name": "Jason Stockman"
            }
        ],
        "NumMessages": 1,
        "NumUnread": 0,
        "NumAttachments": 0,
        "ExpirationTime": 0,
        "TotalSize": 10133,
        "AddressID": "AJuSqm0qvIL4LSMR9LWsqNOa2OlAU_Iqr2Qcducsz-ZA==",
        "LabelIDs": [
            "0", // Inbox
            "10", // Starred
            "G5LuBhyf5dezEmhqiTNhqP1G3ZR8cxeyzU9oxAOcuwKyHng06rbg==" // User label
        ]
        "Labels": [
            {
                "ID": "0", // Inbox
                "NumUnread" : 0,
                "NumMessages": 1
            },
            {
                "ID": "10", // Starred
                "NumUnread" : 0,
                "NumMessages": 1
            },
            {
                "ID": "G5LuBhyf5dezEmhqiTNhqP1G3ZR8cxeyzU9oxAOcuwKyHng06rbg==", // User label
                "NumUnread" : 0,
                "NumMessages": 1
            }
        ]
    },
    "Messages": [
        {   // Metadata for all but one messages
            "ID": "qvIL4LSMR9LWsqNOa2OlAU_Iqr2Qcducsz-ZA==",
            "Order": 734,
            "ConversationID": "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w==",
            "Subject": "Re: Checking in",
            "Unread": 0,
            "Type": 0, // 0 = INBOX, 1 = DRAFT, 2 = SENT, 3 = INBOX_AND_SENT
            "Sender": {
                "Address": "example@example.com",
                "Name": "Example McExample"
            },
            "ToList": [
                {
                    "Address": "jason@protonmail.ch",
                    "Name": "Jason Stockman"
                }
            ],
            "Time": 1419011135,
            "Size": 10133,
            "Location": 0, // To be removed
            "Starred": 1, // To be removed
            "HasAttachment": 0,
            "IsEncrypted": 2,
            "ExpirationTime": 0,
            "IsReplied": 0,
            "IsRepliedAll": 1,
            "IsForwarded": 0,
            "AddressID": "222",
            "CCList":[

            ],
            "BCCList":[

            ],
            "LabelIDs": [
                "0", // Inbox
                "10", // Starred
                "G5LuBhyf5dezEmhqiTNhqP1G3ZR8cxeyzU9oxAOcuwKyHng06rbg==" // User label
            ]
        },
        {   // Full message for one message
            "ID": "ASFIkGVa11jda2OlAU_Iqr2Qcducsz-ZA==",
            "Order": 756,
            "ConversationID": "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w==",
            "Subject": "Re: Checking in",
            "Unread": 0,
            "Type": 0, // 0 = INBOX, 1 = DRAFT, 2 = SENT, 3 = INBOX_AND_SENT
            "Sender": {
                "Address": "example@example.com",
                "Name": "Example McExample"
            },
            "ToList": [
                {
                    "Address": "jason@protonmail.ch",
                    "Name": "Jason Stockman"
                }
            ],
            "Time": 1419011135,
            "Size": 10133,
            "Location": 0, // To be removed
            "Starred": 1, // To be removed
            "HasAttachment": 0,
            "IsEncrypted": 2,
            "ExpirationTime": 0,
            "IsReplied": 0,
            "IsRepliedAll": 1,
            "IsForwarded": 0,
            "SpamScore": 0,
            "AddressID": "222",
            "Body": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE----- -----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
            "MIMEType": "text/html",
            "CCList": [],
            "BCCList": [],
            "Header": "(No Header)",
            "ReplyTo": {
                "Address": "example@example.com",
                "Name": "Example McExample"
            },
            "ReplyTos": [
                {
                    "Address": "example@example.com",
                    "Name": "Example McExample"
                },
                {
                    "Address": "second@example.com",
                    "Name": "Second McExample"
                }
            ],
            "Attachments": [],
            "LabelIDs": [
                "0", // Inbox
                "10", // Starred
                "G5LuBhyf5dezEmhqiTNhqP1G3ZR8cxeyzU9oxAOcuwKyHng06rbg==" // User label
            ]
        }
    ]
}

      Get conversation and associated message metadata
      GET/conversations/{conversationid}?{MessageID}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      conversationid
      "string" (required) Example: ACXDmTaBub14w==

      the conversation id

      MessageID
      string (optional) Example: <encrypted_message_id>

      specific message in conversation to return fully (not only metadata)

      Get Grouped Conversation Count ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/conversations/count
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Counts": [
        {
            "LabelID": "0",
            "Total": 87.
            "Unread": 15
        },
        {
            "LabelID": "1",
            "Total": 42,
            "Unread": 10
        },
        {
            "LabelID": "2",
            "Total": 17,
            "Unread": 7
        },
        {
            "LabelID": "3",
            "Total": 2,
            "Unread": 2
        },
        {
            "LabelID": "4",
            "Total": 1,
            "Unread": 0
        },
        {
            "LabelID": "6",
            "Total": 1,
            "Unread": 0
        },
        {
            "LabelID": "10",
            "Total": 6,
            "Unread": 1
        },
        {
            "LabelID": "D4TVgdFKidFgQWd5IeXYyegjDNV9KWF1HDwjxZlesUo-Wc2NTL8mUQc6IlYwowznc5vHQkTL4iUbn6K0CorrjQ==",
            "Total": 54,
            "Unread": 18
        },
        {
            "LabelID": "6CucpHSMwAfHV3iSUEdbrmI4VLCzM3lWd1NR5C2DGUmfx5Ljq2LEkynoD3y-15stpnTFqWMedJs-pwUUJH1waQ==",
            "Total": 2,
            "Unread": 0
        }
    ]
}

      Get grouped conversation count
      GET/conversations/count

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      AddressID
      string (optional) Example: <encrypted_address_id>

      address to filter on

      Mark Conversations as Read ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/conversations/read
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "IDs": [
    "KPlISx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==",
    "IwuSjbOUIN105YSvVrdig=="
  ]
}
      Responses200
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "KPlISx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "IwuSjbOUIN105YSvVrdig==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Mark an array of conversations as read
      PUT/conversations/read

      Mark Conversations as Unread ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/conversations/unread
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
        "IDs" : [
            "KPlISx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==",
            "IwuSjbOUIN105YSvVrdig=="
        ],
        "LabelID" : "PjSFx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==" // Optional, defaults to AllMail (5)
    }
      Responses200
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "KPlISx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "IwuSjbOUIN105YSvVrdig==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Mark an array of conversations as unread
      PUT/conversations/unread

      Delete Conversations ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/conversations/delete
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
        "IDs" : [
            "KPlISx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==",
            "IwuSjbOUIN105YSvVrdig=="
        ],
        "LabelID" : "PjSFx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==" // Optional, defaults to Trash (3)
    }
      Responses200
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "KPlISx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "IwuSjbOUIN105YSvVrdig==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Delete trashed messages in an array of conversations
      PUT/conversations/delete

      Label/Move Conversations ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/conversations/label
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "LabelID": "ALKJLjalfjl==",
  "IDs": [
    "LKJLalkfejl==",
    "ASia83sJaL=="
  ]
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "LKJLalkfejl==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "ASia83sJaL==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Label/move an array of conversations
      PUT/conversations/label

      Unlabel Conversations ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/conversations/unlabel
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "LabelID": "ALKJLjalfjl==",
  "IDs": [
    "LKJLalkfejl==",
    "ASia83sJaL=="
  ]
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "LKJLalkfejl==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "ASia83sJaL==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Unlabel an array of conversations
      PUT/conversations/unlabel

      Devices ¶

      Register/Update Device ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/devices
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "DeviceUID": "{uid}",
    "DeviceToken": "{token}",
    "DeviceName": "{name}",
    "DeviceModel": "{model}",
    "DeviceVersion": "{version}",
    "AppVersion": "iOS_0.1.0",
    "Environment": {integer} // Optional
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Register device
      POST/devices

      Unregister Device ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/devices
