      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      UnRegister device
      DELETE/devices

      iOS Notification Test ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/devices/ios/?token=abcdefghijklm
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Badge": 2,
  "Text": "Test Message with will be the subject when live",
  "MessageID": "CdlKuzptf4907WykwVmdMJlVzUX80whXCUjiQFo48938ThDqBgW-I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w=="
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      iOS Notification Test
      POST/devices/ios/{?token}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      token
      "string" (required) Example: abcdefghijklm

      the token

      Android Notification Test ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/devices/android/?token=abcdefghijklm
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Title": "title message",
  "Subtitle": "subtitle message",
  "Badge": 2,
  "Text": "Test Message with will be the subject when live",
  "MessageID": "CdlKuzptf4907WykwVmdMJlVzUX80whXCUjiQFo48938ThDqBgW-I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w=="
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Android Notification Test
      POST/devices/android/{?token}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      token
      "string" (required) Example: abcdefghijklm

      the token

      Domains ¶

      Get Domains ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/domains
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json
      Body
      {
    "Domains": [
        {
            "ID": "BKiAUbkGnUPiy2c37zjon_g==",
            "DomainName": "DingchaoLu.com",
            "VerifyCode": "protonmail-verification=c701a28e2bdd3358c6dda71a3008b806e41950b0",
            "DkimPublicKey": "v=DKIM1; k=rsa; p=MIGfMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBAQUAA4GNADCBiQKBgQDKZ4rqzKDKrfJHKNfTgh1B/3NtoHrR8T4YXTuHltpFJlhc+GcjDEpf2tvzHnR7R7EbhOdiwy4SLgCXqEIRQe7swOT8vq5zPZ6/I50o8isxz50QlkvNoIWyeiNQqlDPQLQey0QXSfLznQY/bHxvKAqAi33CCHwS/OPuuWcHq8DCqQIDAQAB",
            "State": 1,  // 0 is default, 1 is active (verified), 2 is warn (dns issue)
            "CheckTime": 1446095611,
            "VerifyState": 2,   // 0 is default, 1 is has code but wrong, 2 is good
            "MxState": 3,   // 0 is default, 1 is set but no us, 2 has us but priority is wrong, 3 is good
            "SpfState": 3,  // 0 is default, 1 and 2 means detected a record but wrong, 3 is good
            "DkimState": 4,     // 0 is default, 1 and 2 means detected record but wrong, 3 means key is wrong, 4 is good, 5 is turned off by user through DNS
            "DmarcState": 3,    // 0 is default, 1 and 2 means detected record but wrong, 3 is good
        },
        {
            "ID": "FK4MKKIVJqOC9Pg_sAxCjNWf8PM9yGzrXO3eXq8sk5RJB6HtaRBNUEcnvJBrQVPAtrDSoTNq4Du3FpqIxyMhHQ==",
            "DomainName": "funoccupied.com",
            "VerifyCode": "protonmail-verification=1d439ec16a149d45b1e7b54ed57bf197b89ac1aa",
            "DkimPublicKey": null,
            "State": 0,
            "CheckTime": 1446096501,
            "VerifyState": 2,
            "MxState": 1,
            "SpfState": 1,
            "DkimState": 0,
            "DmarcState": 0,
        }
    ],
    "Code": 1000
}

      Get all domains for this user's organization and check their DNS's
      GET/domains

      Get Domain ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/domains/lKJlejjlk==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json
      Body
      {
    "Domain": {
        "ID": "BKiAUbkGnUPiy2c3nJs6qdQrdvHj7zjon_g==",
        "DomainName": "DingchaoLu.com",
        "VerifyCode": "protonmail-verification=c701a28e2bdd3358c6dda71a3008b806e41950b0",
        "DkimPublicKey": "v=DKIM1; k=rsa; p=MIGfMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBAQUAA4GNADCBiQKBgQDKZ4rqzKDKrfJHKNfTgh1B/3NtoHrR8T4YXTuHltpFJlhc+GcjDEpf2tvzHnR7R7EbhOdiwy4SLgCXqEIRQe7swOT8vq5zPZ6/I50o8isxz50QlkvNoIWyeiNQqlDPQLQey0QXSfLznQY/bHxvKAqAi33CCHwS/OPuuWcHq8DCqQIDAQAB",
        "State": 1,
        "CheckTime": 1446099804,
        "VerifyState": 2,
        "MxState": 3,
        "SpfState": 3,
        "DkimState": 4,
        "DmarcState": 3,
    },
    "Code": 1000
}

      Get a specific domains and its check DNS
      GET/domains/{domainid}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      domainid
      "string" (required) Example: lKJlejjlk==

      the encrypted id

      Get Domain Addresses ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/domains/lKJlejjlk==/addresses
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json
      Body
      {
    "Addresses": [
        {
            "ID": "vuGSa1zsx0kV0jsfhX_xKSDQ0dvcLdMduA_c2c9fhaC1ZYCZKe8gony7nIWbnqaj8gebXLCQre1H1ZTKkhhFxA==",
            "Email": "me@dingchaolu.com",
            "Send": 1,          // 1 is active address (Status=1 and has key), 0 is inactive (cannot send)
            "Status": 1,        // 0 is disabled, 1 is enabled, can be set by user
            "Type": 1,          // 1 is original PM, 2 is PM alias, 3 is custom domain address
            "Receive": 1,       // 1 is active address (Status=1 and has key), 0 is inactive (cannot receive)
            "Order": 5,
            "DisplayName": "hi", // From user object if no address display name set
            "Signature": "signature", // From user object if no address signature set
            "HasKeys" : 1,
            "CatchAll": 0, // whether this is the catch-all address for this domain
            "MemberID": "gony7nIWbnqaj8gebXLCQre1H1ZTKkhhFxA=="
        }
    ]
}

      Get a specific domain's addresses
      GET/domains/{domainid}/addresses

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      domainid
      "string" (required) Example: lKJlejjlk==

      the encrypted id

      Page
      integer (optional) Default: 0 Example: 0

      the page index

      PageSize
      integer (optional) Default: 150 Example: 150

      the page size, maximum 150

      Get Available Domains ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/domains/available
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json
      Body
      {
    "Domains": [
        'protonmail.com',
        'protonmail.ch'
    ],
    "Code": 1000
}

      Get available domains
      GET/domains/available

      Get Premium Domains ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/domains/premium
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json
      Body
      {
    "Domains": [
        'pm.me'
    ],
    "Code": 1000
}

      Get premium domains
      GET/domains/premium

      Create Domain ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/domains
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Name": "funoccupied.com"
}
      Responses200200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
        "Domain": {
            "ID": "FK4MKKIVJqOC9Pg_sAxCvJNq4Du3FpqIxyMhHQ==",
            "DomainName": "funoccupied.com",
            "VerifyCode": "protonmail-verification=1d439ec16a149d45b1e7b54ed57bf197b89ac1aa",
            "DkimPublicKey": null,
            "State": 0,
            "CheckTime": 0,
            "VerifyState": 0,
            "MxState": 0,
            "SpfState": 0,
            "DkimState": 0,
            "DmarcState": 0,
        },
        "Code": 1000
    // return domain info if success
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 30106,
  "Error": "Domain setup failed or domain is already in use within ProtonMail",
  "Details": {}
}

      Create new Domain, locked route
      POST/domains

      Set Catch-All Address ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/domains/lKJlejjlk==/catchall
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "AddressID": <encrypted_id> // or null to unset
}
      Responses200
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Set catch-all address, locked route
      PUT/domains/{domainid}/catchall

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      domainid
      "string" (required) Example: lKJlejjlk==

      the encrypted id

      Delete Domain ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/domains/lKJlejjlk==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete a Domain, locked route
      DELETE/domains/{domainid}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      domainid
      "string" (required) Example: lKJlejjlk==

      the encrypted id

      EO ¶

      Get Token ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/eo/token/
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Token": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----"
}

      Get an encrypted access token by ID
      GET/eo/token/{tokenID}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      tokenID
      "string" (required) Example: <tokenID from notification email>

      Get Message ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/eo/message
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: {decrypted_token}
      x-eo-uid: {token_id}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code":1000,
    "Message":{
        "Subject":"enc outside test 2",
        "Sender": {
            "Address":"jason@protonmail.dev",
            "Name":"\u79d1\u6280\u798f\u5e03\u65af\u4e2d\u6587\u7f51"
        },
        "Recipient": "bart.c.butler@gmail.com",
        "ToList":[
            {
                "Address":"bart.c.butler@gmail.com",
                "Name":""
            },
            {
                "Address":"jason@localhost",
                "Name":""
            }
        ],
        "CCList":[

        ],
        "Time":1428362148,
        "ExpirationTime":1428369148,
        "Body":" -----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
        "Replies":[
            {
                "Time":1434490380,
                "Body":"-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
                "Attachments":[

                ]
            },
            {
                "Time":1434490488,
                "Body":"-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
                "Attachments":[

                ]
            }
        ],
        "NumAttachments": 0,
        "Attachments":[

        ]
    },
    "PublicKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----" // Sender public key, for replies
}

      Get an EO message
      GET/eo/message

      Get Attachment ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/eo/attachment/
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: {decrypted_token}
      x-eo-uid: {token_id}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: */*
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Disposition: attachment; filename = "Issue 4.png"
      Content-Type: image/png
      Content-Length: 1532
      Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary
      Body
      {binary_file_content_or_encrypted_data_packet}

      Get an EO attachment by ID
      GET/eo/attachment/{attachmentID}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      attachmentID
      "string" (required) Example: <encrypted attachment id>

      Reply ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/eo/reply
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
      Authorization: {decrypted_token}
      x-eo-uid: {token_id}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      ----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Body"

-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="ReplyBody"

-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW       // Optionally, one or more attachments in arrays
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Filename[]"

test.txt
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="MIMEType[]"

text/plain
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="ContentID[]" // For embedded images. Empty string is no content ID

----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="KeyPackets[]"; filename="temp1"
Content-Type: doesnot/matter

{binary key packet(s)}

----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="DataPacket[]"; filename="temp2"
Content-Type: doesnot/matter

{encrypted data packet}

----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Reply": {
    "Time": 1434491458,
    "Body": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
    "Attachments": []
  }
}

      Reply to an EO message
      POST/eo/reply

      Events ¶

      Get Latest ID ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/events/latest
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "EventID": "ACXDmTaBub14w=="
}

      Get latest event ID, only use with empty cache to bootstrap event stream
      GET/events/latest

      Get Events ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/events/ACXDmTaBub14w==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code":1000,
    "EventID":"ACXDmTaBub14w==", // new client event ID, send with next request
    "Refresh":0, // bitmap, 255 means throw out client cache and reload everything from server, 1 is mail, 2 is contacts
    "More": 0, // 1 if more events exist and should be fetched
    "Messages":[  // Present if message updated by anyone, or created by different UID
        {
            "ID":"FSDfsACXDmTaBub14asdfw==",
            "Action":0 // DELETE code, delete from cache/lists if present
        },
        {
            "ID":"adsfasdfasfACXDmTaBub14w==",
            "Action":1, // CREATE code, metadata provided for message list update
            "Message":{
                "ID":"adsfasdfasfACXDmTaBub14w==",
                "Subject":"Hi",
                "Unread":0,
                "Type": 0, // 0 = INBOX, 1 = DRAFT, 2 = SENT, 3 = INBOX_AND_SENT
                "Sender": {
                    "Address":"jason@protonmail.dev",
                    "Name":"\u79d1\u6280\u798f\u5e03\u65af\u4e2d\u6587\u7f51"
                },
                "ToList":[
                    {
                        "Address":"bart.c.butler@gmail.com",
                        "Name":"Bart"
                    },
                    {
                        "Address":"bartqa@localhost",
                        "Name":"Bart"
                    }
                ],
                "Time":1435258429,
                "Size":6959782,
                "Location":1, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
                "Starred":0, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
                "HasAttachment":1, // Deprecated, use NumAttachments instead
                "NumAttachments":1,
                "IsEncrypted":5,
                "ExpirationTime":0,
                "IsReplied":0,
                "IsRepliedAll":0,
                "IsForwarded":0,
                "AddressID":"adsfasdfasfACXDmTaBub14w==",
                "CCList":[

                ],
                "BCCList":[

                ],
                "LabelIDs":[
                    "1"
                ]
            }
        },
        {
            "ID":"sadfaACXDmTaBub14w==",
            "Action":2, // UPDATE code, updated message (draft), only some flags provided but should reload this message if relevant to client
            "Message":{
                "Unread":0, // Can be present
                "Type": 1, // Can be present, 0 = INBOX, 1 = DRAFT, 2 = SENT, 3 = INBOX_AND_SENT
                "Time":1435258429, // Always present
                "Location":1, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
                "Starred":0, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
                "IsReplied":0, // Can be present
                "IsRepliedAll":0, // Can be present
                "IsForwarded":0 // Can be present
            }
        },
        {
            "ID":"ACXDmTaBub14w==",
            "Action":3, // UPDATE_FLAGS code, update message flags only, apply to client cache
            "Message":{
                "Unread":0, // Can be present
                "Type": 0, // Can be present, 0 = INBOX, 1 = DRAFT, 2 = SENT, 3 = INBOX_AND_SENT
                "Time":1435258429, // Always present
                "Location":0, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
                "Starred":0, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
                "IsReplied":0, // Can be present
                "IsRepliedAll":0, // Can be present
                "IsForwarded":0, // Can be present
                "LabelIDs":[ // If present, replace LabelIDs with these
                    "0",
                    "TGmTaBub14w==",
                    "ACXDmTaBub14w=="
                ],
                "LabelIDsAdded": [
                    "DmTaBub14w==" // If present, add these labels to message
                ],
                "LabelIDsRemoved": [
                    "VsSDFb14w==" // If present, remove these labels from message
                ]
            }
        }
    ],
    "Contacts":[
        {
            "ID":"afeaefaeTaBub14w==",
            "Action":1, // Can be CREATE, UPDATE, OR DELETE
            "Contact":{
                "ID":"sadfaACXDmTaBub14w==",
                "Name":"test1",
                "Data": [    // can be empty
                    {
                        "Type": 1,
                        "Data": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----"
                    }
                ],
                "LabelIDs":[],
                "Emails":[
                    {
                        "ID": "aefew4323jFv0BhSMw==",   // ContactList.ContactID
                        "Email": "features@protonmail.black",
                        "Type": "work",
                        "Defaults": "1",                 // ignore for now, future feature
                        "Order": "1",
                        "ContactID": "sadfaACXDmTaBub14w==",
                        "LabelIDs": [                   // Groups
                            "afeaefaefaef==",
                            "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w=="
                        ]
                    },
                    {
                        "ID": "dbdvrafejFv0BhSMw==",
                        "Email": "features@protonmail.ch",
                        "Type": "home",
                        "Defaults": "1",
                        "Order": "2",
                        "ContactID": "sadfaACXDmTaBub14w==",
                        "LabelIDs": []
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    ],
    "ContactEmails":[    // Contact Emails
        {
            "ID":"sadfaACXDmTaBub14w==",
            "Action":1, // Can be CREATE, UPDATE, OR DELETE
            "ContactEmail":{
                "ID":"dbdvrafejFv0BhSMw==",
                "Name":"test1",
                "Email":"mctester@tester.com",
                "Type":"work",
                "Defaults":"1",
                "Order":"1",
                "ContactID":"sadfaACXDmTaBub14w",
                "LabelIDs": [                   // Groups
                    "afeaefaefaef==",
                    "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w=="
                ]
            }
        }
    ],
    "Labels":[
        {
            "ID":"sadfaACXDmTaBub14w==",
            "Action":1, // Can be CREATE, UPDATE, OR DELETE
            "Label":{
                "ID":"sadfaACXDmTaBub14w==",
                "Name":"Event Label!",
                "Color":"#f66",
                "Display":1,
                "Order":8,
                "Type":1,     // different for Messages, Contact Groups
                "Exclusive": 0 // 0 for labels, 1 for folders
            }
        }
    ],
    "Subscription": {
        "ID": "<encrypted_sub_id>",
        "InvoiceID": "<encrypted_invoice_id>",
        "Cycle": 1,
        "PeriodStart": 1455617471,
        "PeriodEnd": 1458119471,
        "CouponCode": null,
        "Currency": "USD",
        "Amount": 1500,
        "Plans": [
            {
                "ID": "<encrypted_plan_id2>",
                "Type": 1,
                "Cycle": 1,
                "Name": "business",
                "Title": "ProtonMail Business (monthly)",
                "Currency": "USD",
                "Amount": 1000,
                "MaxDomains": 1,
                "MaxAddresses": 5,
                "MaxSpace": 10737418240,
                "MaxMembers": 2,
                "MaxVPN": 0,
                "Services": 1, // bits, 1 = mail, 4 = VPN
                "Features": 1 // bits, 1 = catch-all addresses
            },
            {
                "ID": "<encrypted_plan_id2>",
                "Type": 0,
                "Cycle": 1,
                "Name": "1member",
                "Title": "+1 Member (monthly)",
                "Currency": "USD",
                "Amount": 500,
                "MaxDomains": 0,
                "MaxAddresses": 0,
                "MaxSpace": 0,
                "MaxMembers": 1,
                "MaxVPN": 0,
                "Services": 1, // bits, 1 = mail, 4 = VPN
                "Features": 0 // bits, 1 = catch-all addresses
            }
        ]
    },
    "User": {
        "ID": "MJLke8kWh1BBvG95JBIrZvzpgsZ94hNNgjNHVyhXMiv4g9cn6SgvqiIFR5cigpml2LD_iUk_3DkV29oojTt3eA==",
        "Name": "jason",
        "UsedSpace": 96691332,
        "Currency": "USD",
        "Credit": 0,
        "MaxSpace": 10737418240,
        "MaxUpload": 26214400,
        "Role": 2,
        "Private": 1,
        "Subscribed": 1,
        "Services": 1,
        "Delinquent": 0,
        "Keys": [
            {
                "ID": "IlnTbqicN-2HfUGIn-ki8bqZfLqNj5ErUB0z24Qx5g-4NvrrIc6GLvEpj2EPfwGDv28aKYVRRrSgEFhR_zhlkA==",
                "Version": 3,
                "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
                "Fingerprint": "c93f767df53b0ca8395cfde90483475164ec6353",
                "Activation": null,
                "Primary": 1
            }
        ]
    },
    "UserSettings": {
        "PasswordMode": 1,
        "Email": {
            "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 1,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "News": 244,
        "Locale": "en_US",
        "LogAuth": 2,
        "InvoiceText": "",
        "TwoFactor": 0
    },
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "This is my signature",
        "Theme": "",
        "AutoResponder": {
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 1,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    },
    "VPNSettings": {
        "Name": "jason1",
        "Password": "123",
        "GroupID": "jason",
        "Status": 1, // 0 = no vpn access, 1 = vpn access, 2 = vpn access eligible, 3 = vpn access requested (waitlist)
        "ExpirationTime": 0, // only relevant for 'trial' plan, timestamp if non-zero
        "PlanName": "visionary", // other plans include 'free' and 'trial'
        "MaxConnect": 10,
        "MaxTier": 2
    },
    "Invoices": [
        {
            "ID": "IlnTbqicN-2HfUGIn-ki8bqZfLqNj5ErUB0z24Qx5g-4NvrrIc6GLvEpj2EPfwGDv28aKYVRRrSgEFhR_zhlkA==",

      Get events since id
      GET/events/{eventid}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      eventid
      "string" (required) Example: ACXDmTaBub14w==

      the current client event id

      Filters ¶

      Create filters ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/filters
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Name": "Example",
  "Sieve": "require [\"fileinto\"]; if address :DOMAIN :is [\"From\", \"Delivered-To\"] \"protonmail.ch\" { fileinto \"mylabel\"; } else { keep; }",
  "Version": 1
}
      Responses

      Add filter using Sieve
      POST/filters

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/filters
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Name": "Example",
  "Tree": [
    {
      "List": [
        "fileinto"
      ],
      "Type": "Require"
    },
    {
      "If": {
        "Headers": [
          "From",
          "Delivered-To"
        ],
        "Keys": [
          "protonmail.ch"
        ],
        "Match": {
          "Type": "Is"
        },
        "Format": {
          "Type": "UnicodeCaseMap"
        },
        "Type": "Address",
        "AddressPart": {
          "Type": "Domain"
        }
      },
      "Then": [
        {
          "Name": "mylabel",
          "Type": "FileInto"
        }
      ],
      "Type": "If",
      "Else": [
        {
          "Type": "Keep"
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "Version": 1
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Filter": {
    "ID": "1004",
    "Name": "Example",
    "Status": 1,
    "Priority": 3,
    "Sieve": "require [\"fileinto\"]; if address :DOMAIN :is [\"From\", \"Delivered-To\"] \"protonmail.ch\" { fileinto \"mylabel\"; } else { keep; }",
    "Tree": [
      {
        "List": [
          "fileinto"
        ],
        "Type": "Require"
      },
      {
        "If": {
          "Headers": [
            "From",
            "Delivered-To"
          ],
          "Keys": [
            "protonmail.ch"
          ],
          "Match": {
            "Type": "Is"
          },
          "Format": {
            "Type": "UnicodeCaseMap"
          },
          "Type": "Address",
          "AddressPart": {
            "Type": "Domain"
          }
        },
        "Then": [
          {
            "Name": "mylabel",
            "Type": "FileInto"
          }
        ],
        "Type": "If",
        "Else": [
          {
            "Type": "Keep"
          }
        ]
      }
    ],
    "Version": 1
  },
  "Code": 1000
}

      Add filter using Tree
      POST/filters

      Get filter ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/filters
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Filters": [
    {
      "ID": "Ik65N-aChBuWFdo1JpmHJB4iWetfzjVLNILERQqbYFBZc5crnxOabXKuIMKhiwBNwiuogItetAUvkFTwJFJPQg==",
      "Name": "Updated",
      "Status": 1,
      "Priority": 1,
      "Sieve": "require [\"fileinto\"]; if address :DOMAIN :is [\"From\", \"Delivered-To\"] \"protonmail.ch\" { fileinto \"mylabel\"; } else { keep; }",
      "Tree": [
        {
          "If": {
            "Headers": [
              "From",
              "Delivered-To"
            ],
            "Keys": [
              "protonmail.ch"
            ],
            "Match": {
              "Type": "Is"
            },
            "Format": {
              "Type": "UnicodeCaseMap"
            },
            "Type": "Address",
            "AddressPart": {
              "Type": "Domain"
            }
          },
          "Then": [
            {
              "Type": "Fileinto",
              "Name": "mylabel"
            }
          ],
          "Type": "If"
        }
      ],
      "Version": 1
    }
  ],
  "Code": 1000
}

      Get filters owned by the current user
      GET/filters

      Clear filters ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/filters
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete all of user's filters
      DELETE/filters

      Update filter ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/filters/abcdefghijklm
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    // All parameters are optional
    "Name": "Example",
    "Sieve": "require [\"fileinto\"]; if address :DOMAIN :is [\"From\", \"Delivered-To\"] \"protonmail.ch\" { fileinto \"mylabel\"; } else { keep; }",
    "Tree": [
        {
            "List": [
                "fileinto"
            ],
            "Type": "Require"
        },
        {
            "If": {
                "Headers": [
                    "From",
                    "Delivered-To"
                ],
                "Keys": [
                    "protonmail.ch"
                ],
                "Match": {
                    "Type": "Is"
                },
                "Format": {
                    "Type": "UnicodeCaseMap"
                },
                "Type": "Address",
                "AddressPart": {
                    "Type": "Domain"
                }
            },
            "Then": [
                {
                    "Name": "mylabel",
                    "Type": "FileInto"
                }
            ],
            "Type": "If",
            "Else": [
                {
                    "Type": "Keep"
                }
            ]
        }
    ],
    "Version": 1
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Filter": {
    "ID": "1004",
    "Name": "Example",
    "Status": 1,
    "Priority": 3,
    "Sieve": "require [\"fileinto\"]; if address :DOMAIN :is [\"From\", \"Delivered-To\"] \"protonmail.ch\" { fileinto \"mylabel\"; } else { keep; }",
    "Tree": [
      {
        "List": [
          "fileinto"
        ],
        "Type": "Require"
      },
      {
        "If": {
          "Headers": [
            "From",
            "Delivered-To"
          ],
          "Keys": [
            "protonmail.ch"
          ],
          "Match": {
            "Type": "Is"
          },
          "Format": {
            "Type": "UnicodeCaseMap"
          },
          "Type": "Address",
          "AddressPart": {
            "Type": "Domain"
          }
        },
        "Then": [
          {
            "Name": "mylabel",
            "Type": "FileInto"
          }
        ],
        "Type": "If",
        "Else": [
          {
            "Type": "Keep"
          }
        ]
      }
    ],
    "Version": 1
  },
  "Code": 1000
}

      Update parameters of a specific filter
      PUT/filters/{FilterID}

      The following parameters can be updated:

      'Name'     => 'string',
'Tree'     => 'array',
'Sieve'    => 'string',
'Version'  => 'integer'

      ‘Sieve’ representation always takes precedence over other possible representation like ‘Tree’.

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      FilterID
      "string" (required) Example: abcdefghijklm

      Filter ID

      Check sieve filter ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/filters/check
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Version": 1,
  "Sieve": "Sieve code goes here"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Issues" : [
        [
            "severity": "error",
            "message": "This is an error message",
            "from": [
                "line" => 0,
                "ch" => 0,
                "sticky" => null
            ],
            "to": [
                "line" => 2,
                "ch" => 10000,
                "sticky" => null
            ]
        ]
    ]
}

      Check sieve filter syntax
      PUT/filters/check

      Enable filter ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/filters/abcdefghijklm/enable
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Enable a specific filter
      PUT/filters/{FilterID}/enable

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      FilterID
      "string" (required) Example: abcdefghijklm

      Filter ID

      Disable filter ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/filters/abcdefghijklm/disable
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Disable a specific filter
      PUT/filters/{FilterID}/disable

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      FilterID
      "string" (required) Example: abcdefghijklm

      Filter ID

      Delete filter ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/filters/abcdefghijklm
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete a specific filter
      DELETE/filters/{FilterID}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      FilterID
      "string" (required) Example: abcdefghijklm

      Filter ID

      Update filter order ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/filters/order
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "FilterIDs" : [     // Will amend the order of filters with the order of the corresponding FilterIDs
        "-Bpgivr5H2qGDRiUQ4-7gm5YLf215MEgZCdzOtLW5psxgB8oNc8OnoFRykab4Z23EGEW1ka3GtQPF9xwx9-VUA==",
        "pIJGEYyNFsPEb61otAc47_X8eoSeAfMSokny6dmg3jg2JrcdohiRuWSN2i1rgnkEnZmolVx4Np96IcwxJh1WNw==",
        "l8vWAXHBQmv0u7OVtPbcqMa4iwQaBqowINSQjPrxAr-Da8fVPKUkUcqAq30_BCxj1X0nW70HQRmAa-rIvzmKUA=="
    ],
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Update the user's filter priority
      PUT/filters/order

      Import ¶

      Import ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/import
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: multipart/form-data, boundary=AaB03x
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      X-PM-Uid: {random_user_uid}
      X-PM-Appversion: {app_version} or Other
      X-PM-Apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      --AaB03x
    Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Metadata"
    Content-Type: application/json
{
    "0": {
        "Unread": 0,
        "IsReplied": 1,
        "IsRepliedAll": 0,
        "IsForwarded": 0,
        "LabelIDs": ["1"],
        "Type": 0,
        "AddressID": "{address_id}"
    }
}
--AaB03x
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="0"; filename="0.eml"
Content-Type: message/rfc822

From: emersion <emersion@protonmail.com>
To: Andy <andy@protonmail.com>
Date: Wed, 05 Nov 1984 08:00:00 EST
Subject: Hello World!

-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE----- [...] -----END PGP MESSAGE-----
--AaB03x--
      Responses200429413
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "Name": "0",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000,
        "MessageID": "{new_message_id}"
      }
    },
    {
      "Name": "1",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 400,
        "Error": "Invalid message parent",
        "Details": {}
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Too many requests, see https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6585#section-4

      Headers
      Retry-After: 3600 // In seconds
      Body
      Request entity too large (request body too large/too many messages)

      Bulk import messages
      POST/import

      Requires import authorization scope. Messages must be sent in ascending time order so as to build conversations appropriately.

      AddressID is mandatory: the message is encrypted before being sent to the server, thus the server needs to know which key has been used to encrypt the message. All other fields are optional.

      Incoming Default ¶

      Get Incoming Defaults ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/incomingdefaults?Page=0&PageSize=100&Keyword=@protonmail&Location=0
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "IncomingDefaults": [
        {
            "ID": "AJU1NnasUS92Ksh==",
            "Email": "test@example.com",
            "Location": 0,
            "Type": 1, // 0 = automatic, 1 = user
            "Time": 1461819899
        }
    ],
    "Code": 1000
}

      Get incoming defaults
      GET/incomingdefaults{?Page,PageSize,Keyword,Location}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      Location
      integer (optional) Example: 0

      message location 0 => Inbox, 1 => Draft, 2 => Outbox, 3 => Trash, 4 => Spam, 6 => Archive

      Choices: 0 1 2 3 4 6

      Page
      integer (optional) Default: 0 Example: 0

      the starting page

      PageSize
      integer (optional) Default: 100 Example: 100

      the page size

      Keyword
      string (optional) Example: @protonmail

      the keyword to search on

      Add Incoming Default ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/incomingdefaults
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Email": "test@example.com",
  "Location": 0
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "IncomingDefault": {
        "ID": "AJU1NnasUS92Ksh==",
        "Email": "test@example.com",
        "Location": 0,
        "Type": 1, // 0 = automatic, 1 = user
        "Time": 1461820094
    },
    "Code": 1000
}

      Create new incoming default
      POST/incomingdefaults

      Update Incoming Default ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/incomingdefaults/?incoming_default_id=lKJlejjlk==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Location": 0
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "IncomingDefault": {
        "ID": "lKJlejjlk==",
        "Email": "test@example.com",
        "Location": 0,
        "Type": 1, // 0 = automatic, 1 = user
        "Time": 1461820292
    },
    "Code": 1000
}

      Update an incoming default
      PUT/incomingdefaults/{?incoming_default_id}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      incoming_default_id
      "string" (required) Example: lKJlejjlk==

      the encrypted incoming default id

      Delete Incoming Defaults ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/incomingdefaults/delete
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: random_uid
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "IDs": [
    "gD7tqQFumWuP0P3Jxu_IYoNLsh6CbixlCAnuXbbwnTTUlhTJ5WRDQHk1MnphQQ6IR06W74RxTF-ZSWWjcds8ZA==",
    "xAUc9Wt2C2TEf7810SHO49BHGxz7xZMBcuBQZpyj9dG-kcevbCMr3rlsjMuUOHXMNQhd_QLeLVy0YKIe-vwUIQ=="
  ]
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "gD7tqQFumWuP0P3Jxu_IYoNLsh6CbixlCAnuXbbwnTTUlhTJ5WRDQHk1MnphQQ6IR06W74RxTF-ZSWWjcds8ZA==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "xAUc9Wt2C2TEf7810SHO49BHGxz7xZMBcuBQZpyj9dG-kcevbCMr3rlsjMuUOHXMNQhd_QLeLVy0YKIe-vwUIQ==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Delete array of incoming defaults
      PUT/incomingdefaults/delete

      Clear Incoming Defaults ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/incomingdefaults
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete all contacts
      DELETE/incomingdefaults

      Invitation ¶

      Create Invitation ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/invites
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Email": "notification@email",
    "Type" : 1 // 1 for mail, 2 for VPN
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
}

      Create Invitation
      POST/invites

      Keys ¶

      Get Public Keys ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/keys?]
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "RecipientType": 1, // 1 is ProtonMail, 2 is external
    "MIMEType": "text/html", // Content type preferred by recipient, null if external
    "Keys": [
        {
            "Flags": 3, // bitmap: 1 = can be used to verify, 2 = can be used to encrypt
            "PublicKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----"
        },
        {
            "Flags": 1,
            "PublicKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----"
        }
    ],
    "Warnings" : [] // Array of string warnings about possible issues with address
}

      Get public keys
      GET/keys?]

      Get Key Salts ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/keys/salts
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "KeySalts": [
        {
            "KeyID" : "<encrypted_key_id>",
            "KeySalt" : "<base64_encoded_key_salt>"
        },
        {
            "KeyID" : "<encrypted_key_id>",
            "KeySalt" : "<base64_encoded_key_salt>"
        },
    ]
}

      Get key salts, locked route
      GET/keys/salts

      Create Address Key ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/keys
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "AddressID": "xRvCGwFq_TW7i8FtJaGyFEq0g==",
    "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----"
    "Primary": 1
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Key": {
    "ID": "G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==",
    "Version": 3,
    "Flags": 3,
    "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
    "Fingerprint": "c93f767df53b0ca8395cfde90483475164ec6353",
    "Activation": null,
    "Primary": 1
  },
  "Code": 1000
}

      Create new address key, locked route
      POST/keys

      Setup Keys ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/keys/setup
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "PrimaryKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
    "KeySalt": <base64_encoded_key_salt>, // RANDOMLY generated client-side
    "AddressKeys": [
        {
            "AddressID": "xRvCGwFq_TW7i8FtJaGyFEq0g==",
            "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----"
        },
        {
            "AddressID": "CasdiSFq_TW7i8FtJGuQyFEq0==",
            "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----"
        }
    ],
    "Auth": { // include to enable 1 password mode, otherwise 2 password mode
        "Version" : 4,
        "ModulusID" : <encrypted_id>,
        "Salt" : <base64_encoded_salt>,
        "Verifier" : <base64_encoded_verifier>
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "User": {
    "ID": "MJLke8kWh1BBvG95JBIrZvzpgsZ94hNNgjNHVyhXMiv4g9cn6SgvqiIFR5cigpml2LD_iUk_3DkV29oojTt3eA==",
    "Name": "jason",
    "UsedSpace": 96691332,
    "Currency": "USD",
    "Credit": 0,
    "MaxSpace": 10737418240,
    "MaxUpload": 26214400,
    "Role": 2,
    "Private": 1,
    "Subscribed": 1,
    "Services": 1,
    "VPN": {
      "Status": 1,
      "ExpirationTime": 0,
      "PlanName": "visionary",
      "MaxConnect": 10,
      "MaxTier": 2
    },
    "Delinquent": 0,
    "Keys": [
      {
        "ID": "IlnTbqicN-2HfUGIn-ki8bqZfLqNj5ErUB0z24Qx5g-4NvrrIc6GLvEpj2EPfwGDv28aKYVRRrSgEFhR_zhlkA==",
        "Version": 3,
        "Flags": 3,
        "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
        "Fingerprint": "c93f767df53b0ca8395cfde90483475164ec6353",
        "Activation": null,
        "Primary": 1
      }
    ]
  },
  "Code": 1000
}

      Setup keys for new account, private user
      POST/keys/setup

      Reset Keys ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/keys/reset
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token} // Authentication deprecated
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid} // Authentication deprecated
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Username" : "user_name", // Required if not logged in
    "Token" : "983c8a169ba7ee02", // Reset token
    "PrimaryKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
    "KeySalt": <base64_encoded_key_salt>, // RANDOMLY generated client-side
    "AddressKeys": [
        {
            "AddressID": "xRvCGwFq_TW7i8FtJaGyFEq0g==",
            "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----"
        },
        {
            "AddressID": "CasdiSFq_TW7i8FtJGuQyFEq0==",
            "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----"
        }
    ],
    "Auth": { // // include to enable 1 password mode, otherwise 2 password mode
        "Version" : 4,
        "ModulusID" : <encrypted_id>,
        "Salt" : <base64_encoded_salt>,
        "Verifier" : <base64_encoded_verifier>
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Install a new key for each address
      POST/keys/reset

      Activate Key ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/keys/G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==/activate
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Key": {
    "ID": "G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==",
    "Version": 3,
    "Flags": 3,
    "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
    "Fingerprint": "c93f767df53b0ca8395cfde90483475164ec6353",
    "Activation": null,
    "Primary": 1
  },
  "Code": 1000
}

      Activate newly-provisioned member key by sending a key copy encrypted with current mailbox password
      PUT/keys/{keyid}/activate

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      keyid
      "string" (required) Example: G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==

      the key id

  "Code": 1000

  "Code": 1000

      Reactivate Key ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/keys/G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}

      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other

      Body

  "Key": {
    "ID": "G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==",
    "Version": 3,
    "Flags": 3,
    "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
    "Fingerprint": "c93f767df53b0ca8395cfde90483475164ec6353",
    "Activation": null,
    "Primary": 1
  },
  "Code": 1000

      the key id

      Update Private Keys ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/keys/private
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral": <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_id>,
    "TwoFactorCode": 203941, // if enabled
    "KeySalt": <base64_encoded_key_salt>, // RANDOMLY generated client-side
    "Keys": [ // Includes primary key
        {
            "ID": "G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==",
            "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----"
        },
        {
            "ID": "adsft3Ep5P_EWz8WbasdkVAOl_6h==",
            "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----"
        }
    ],
    "OrganizationKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----", // If org admin and can decrypt org key
    "Auth": { // // include to enable 1 password mode, otherwise 2 password mode
        "Version" : 4,
        "ModulusID" : <encrypted_id>,
        "Salt" : <base64_encoded_salt>,
        "Verifier" : <base64_encoded_verifier>
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Update private keys only, use for mailbox password/single password updates
      PUT/keys/private

      Upgrade Private Keys ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/keys/private/upgrade
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "KeySalt": <base64_encoded_key_salt>, // RANDOMLY generated client-side
    "Keys": [ // Includes primary key
        {
            "ID": "G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==",
            "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----"
        },
        {
            "ID": "adsft3Ep5P_EWz8WbasdkVAOl_6h==",
            "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----"
        }
    ],
    "OrganizationKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----", // If org admin and can decrypt org key
    "Auth": { // // include to enable 1 password mode, otherwise 2 password mode
        "Version" : 4,
        "ModulusID" : <encrypted_id>,
        "Salt" : <base64_encoded_salt>,
        "Verifier" : <base64_encoded_verifier>
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Upgrade private keys with obsolete or incorrect metadata
      PUT/keys/private/upgrade

      Label ¶

      Get Labels ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/labels?1
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Responses200
      Headers
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Labels": [
        {
            "ID": "4v-mQLz2NnvtXP0EI3fFSTcSUoZWZ3xgC1Z-Ngg6M2v5nDqV4vGANE33IdHjvyV6_19E9jdhTQA-ndSj2Hi4cQ==",
            "Name": "New",
            "Color": "#f66",
            "Display": 0,
            "Type": 1,
            "Exclusive": 0,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Order": 1
        },
        {
            "ID": "3pf-EZUUjPtbBvBREF0TOxA4Cq6lYozP7fyUhCa0NnU3Im_QCoihoHN1vJKFWd7_hOx1lR35tAG3C8NjPr70RQ==",
            "Name": "test3",
            "Color": "#f66",
            "Display": 0,
            "Type": 1,
            "Exclusive": 0,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Order": 2
        }
    ]
    // return all of user's labels info
}

      Get user's labels
      GET/labels?{Type}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      Type
      integer (optional) Example: 1

      Type 1 => Message Labels (default), 2 => Contact Groups

      Create Label ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/labels
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Name" : "Red Label",       // required, cannot be same as an existing label of this Type
    "Color" : "#f66",           // required, must match default colors
    "Display" : 0,              // required, 0 = show the label in the sidebar, 1 = hide label from sidebar
    "Type" : 1,                 // required, 1 => Message Labels (default), 2 => Contact Groups
    "Exclusive": 0,             // required, 0 => inclusive (label), 1 => exclusive (folder), message type only
    "Notify": 0                 // required, 0 => no desktop/email notifications, 1 => notifications, message type only
}
      Responses200200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
        "Code": 1000,
        "Label": {
            "ID": "eLzywnz5Bd1T7a-_zsOSu9JUe4ArCLwNJjr_mhxyDel5C7H9zabu6mDW9732JVjZzBXsjmrl8g9DlHpjGQEwBQ==",
            "Name": "Red Label",
            "Color": "#f66",
            "Display": 1,
            "Type": 1,
            "Exclusive": 0,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Order": 17
        }
        // return label info if success
    }
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 14002,
  "Error": "Invalid name",
  "Details": {}
}

      Create new label
      POST/labels

      Order Labels ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/labels/order
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "LabelIDs" : [     // Will amend the order of labels with the order of the corresponding LabelIDs
        "-Bpgivr5H2qGDRiUQ4-7gm5YLf215MEgZCdzOtLW5psxgB8oNc8OnoFRykab4Z23EGEW1ka3GtQPF9xwx9-VUA==",
        "pIJGEYyNFsPEb61otAc47_X8eoSeAfMSokny6dmg3jg2JrcdohiRuWSN2i1rgnkEnZmolVx4Np96IcwxJh1WNw==",
        "l8vWAXHBQmv0u7OVtPbcqMa4iwQaBqowINSQjPrxAr-Da8fVPKUkUcqAq30_BCxj1X0nW70HQRmAa-rIvzmKUA=="
    ],
    "Type" : 1      // optional, 1 => Message Labels (default), 2 => Contact Groups
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Change label priority
      PUT/labels/order

      Update Label ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/labels/lKJlejjlk==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Name": "Stuff",
  "Color": "#ff9",
  "Display": 0,
  "Notify": 0
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Label": {
    "ID": "jBik4gTUekQoequC1A==",
    "Name": "Stuff",
    "Color": "#ff9",
    "Display": 0,
    "Type": 1,
    "Exclusive": 0,
    "Notify": 0,
    "Order": 18
  }
}

      Update existing label
      PUT/labels/{label_id}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      label_id
      "string" (required) Example: lKJlejjlk==

      the encrypted label id

      Delete Label ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/labels/lKJlejjlk==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete a label
      DELETE/labels/{label_id}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      label_id
      "string" (required) Example: lKJlejjlk==

      the encrypted label id

      Logs ¶

      Get Auth Logs ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/logs/auth
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Logs": [
        {
            "Time": 1434654933,
            "Event": 0, // 0 = login password failure, 1 = login success, 2 = logout, 3 = 2FA login failure
            "IP": "192.168.0.1"
        },
        {
            "Time": 1434654930,
            "Event": 0,
            "IP": "192.168.0.1"
        },
        {
            "Time": 1434654925,
            "Event": 0,
            "IP": "192.168.0.1"
        }
    ]
}

      Get authentication logs
      GET/logs/auth

      Clear Auth Logs ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/logs/auth
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete all authentication logs
      DELETE/logs/auth

      Member Keys ¶

      Create Member Address Key ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/members/DFSXmTadD14w==/keys
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Activation": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----"
    "AddressID": "xRvCGwFq_TW7i8FtJaGyFEq0g==",
    "UserKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
    "MemberKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
    "Token": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
    "Primary": 1
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "MemberKey": {
        "ID": "G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==",
        "Version": 3,
        "PublicKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----",
        "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----", // This is the member key
        "Token": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
        "Fingerprint": "c93f767df53b0ca8395cfde90483475164ec6353",
        "Activation": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
        "Primary": 1,
        "Flags": 3
    },
    "Code": 1000
}

      Create new member address key, locked route
      POST/members/{memberid}/keys

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      memberid
      "string" (required) Example: DFSXmTadD14w==

      the member id

      Setup Member Keys ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/members/DFSXmTadD14w==/keys/setup
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "KeySalt": "akYwFq_TW7i8FtJaGyFEq0g==",
    "PrimaryKey": {
        "UserKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
        "MemberKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
        "Token": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----"
    }
    "AddressKeys": [
        {
            "AddressID": "xRvCGwFq_TW7i8FtJaGyFEq0g==",
            "UserKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
            "MemberKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
            "Token": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----"
        }
    ],
    "Auth": { // include to enable 1 password mode, otherwise 2 password mode
        "Version" : 4,
        "ModulusID" : <encrypted_id>,
        "Salt" : <base64_encoded_salt>,
        "Verifier" : <base64_encoded_verifier>
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Member": {
        "ID": "xRvCGwFq_TW7i8FtJaGyFEq0g==",
        "Role": 2, // 2 for owner, 1 for member
        "Private": 1, // 1 for private user, admins cannot read mail
        "Type": 0, // 0 for PM user, 1 for non-PM
        "MaxSpace": 100000000,
        "Name": "Jason",
        "UsedSpace": 81780955,
        "Keys": [
            {
                "ID": "adsfgt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==",
                "Version": 3,
                "PublicKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----",
                "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----", // This is the member key
                "Token": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
                "Fingerprint": "c93f767df53b0ca8395cfde90483475164ec6353",
                "Activation": null,
                "Primary": 1,
                "Flags": 3
            }
        ]
    },
    "Code": 1000
}

      Setup new member keys, locked route
      POST/members/{memberid}/keys/setup

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      memberid
      "string" (required) Example: DFSXmTadD14w==

      the member id

      Update Member Key ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/members/DFSXmTadD14w==/keys/ACXDmTaBub14w==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "KeySalt": "akYwFq_TW7i8FtJaGyFEq0g==",
    "UserKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
    "MemberKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
    "Token": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
    "Auth": { // include if updating primary key to enable 1 password mode, otherwise 2 password mode
        "Version" : 4,
        "ModulusID" : <encrypted_id>,
        "Salt" : <base64_encoded_salt>,
        "Verifier" : <base64_encoded_verifier>
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "MemberKey": {
        "ID": "G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==",
        "PublicKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----",
        "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----", // This is the member key
        "Token": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
        "Fingerprint": "c93f767df53b0ca8395cfde90483475164ec6353",
        "Activation": null,
        "Primary": 1
    },
    "Code": 1000
}

      Update member key, can change user mailbox password if key is primary, locked route
      PUT/members/{memberid}/keys/{keyid}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      memberid
      "string" (required) Example: DFSXmTadD14w==

      the member id

      keyid
      "string" (required) Example: ACXDmTaBub14w==

      the key id

      Make Primary Member Key ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/members/DFSXmTadD14w==/keys/ACXDmTaBub14w==/primary
      Requestsexample 1

      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Make address member key primary, locked route

      URI Parameters

      memberid
      "string" (required) Example: DFSXmTadD14w==

      the member id

      keyid
      "string" (required) Example: ACXDmTaBub14w==

      the key id

      Members ¶

      Get Members ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/members
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json
      Body
      {
  "Members": [
    {
      "ID": "xRvCGwFq_TW7i8FtJaGyFEq0g==",
      "Role": 2,
      "Private": 1,
      "Type": 0,
      "MaxSpace": 100000000,
      "MaxVPN": 0,
      "Name": "Jason",
      "UsedSpace": 81780955,
      "Self": 1,
      "Subscriber": 1,
      "Keys": [],
      "PublicKey": "-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----"
    },
    {
      "ID": "dRs2Vv64Vru392SbvvG1MbEt3Ep5P==",
      "Role": 1,
      "Private": 0,
      "Type": 1,
      "MaxSpace": 0,
      "MaxVPN": 0,
      "Name": "Bart",
      "UsedSpace": 0,
      "Self": 0,
      "Subscriber": 0,
      "Keys": [],
      "PublicKey": null
    }
  ],
  "Code": 1000
}

      Get all members of user's organization
      GET/members

      Get Member ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/members/ACXDmTaBub14w==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json
      Body
      {
    "Member": {
        "ID": "xRvCGwFq_TW7i8FtJaGyFEq0g==",
        "Role": 2, // 2 for owner, 1 for member
        "Private": 1, // 1 for private user, admins cannot read mail
        "Type": 0, // 0 for PM user, 1 for non-PM
        "MaxSpace": 100000000,
        "MaxVPN" : 0,
        "Name": "Jason",
        "UsedSpace": 81780955,
        "Type": 0,
        "Self": 1,
        "Subscriber": 1,
        "Keys" : [],
        "PublicKey": "-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----"
    },
    "Code": 1000
}

      Requestsexample 1

      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other

      Body
      {
    "Addresses": [
        {
            "ID": "qmhrlFY24BhSHiFplF0B7G_cMVLi1sokaWIhfNaee6dRtdIZPYnqgI4-MpAb8h3JhOOykKv8ZsuTH8X_SrUZSg==",
            "DomainID": "l8vWAXHBQmv0u7OVtPbcqMa4iwQaBqowINSQjPrxAr-Da8fVPKUkUcqAq30_BCxj1X0nW70HQRmAa-rIvzmKUA==",
            "Email": "jason@custom.dev",
            "Send": 1,
            "Receive": 1,
            "Status": 1,
            "Type": 1,
            "DisplayName": "D L'u, P.D. 定超",
            "Signature": "hi there",
            "HasKeys": 1,
            "Keys": [
                {
                    "ID": "G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==",
                    "Version": 3,
                    "PublicKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----",
                    "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----.*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----", // This is the member key
                    "Token": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
                    "Fingerprint": "c93f767df53b0ca8395cfde90483475164ec6353",
                    "Activation": null,
                    "Primary": 1
                }
            ]
        }
    ],
    "Code": 1000
}

      Get addresses of a member
      GET/members/{memberid}/addresses

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      memberid
      "string" (required) Example: ACXDmTaBub14w==

      the member id

      Page
      integer (optional) Default: 0 Example: 0

      the page index

      PageSize
      integer (optional) Default: 150 Example: 150

      the page size, maximum 150

      Create Member ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/members
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Name": "Jason",
    "Private": 0,
    "MaxSpace": 1073741824,
    "MaxVPN" : 0,
    "Auth": {
        "Version" : 4,
        "ModulusID" : <encrypted_id>,
        "Salt" : <base64_encoded_salt>,
        "Verifier" : <base64_encoded_verifier>
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Member": {
    "ID": "44j9R3b8kckYBHvp84U==",
    "Role": 1,
    "Private": 0,
    "Type": 1,
    "MaxSpace": 1073741824,
    "MaxVPN": 0,
    "Name": "Jason",
    "UsedSpace": 0,
    "Self": 0,
    "Subscriber": 0,
    "Keys": [],
    "PublicKey": null
  },
  "Code": 1000
}

      Create new Member, locked route
      POST/members

      Create Member Address ¶

      Login As Member ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/members/auth
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral" : <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof" : <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_id>,
    "TwoFactorCode": 123456 // Required if enabled
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "ServerProof": <base64_encoded_proof>
    "UID": "f3804b2ad70c3992a9496ff07f3e9b93",
    "Code": 1000
}

      Login as non-private member, password route
      POST/members/auth

    "Role": 2, // 1 = Member, 2 = Owner
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body

  "Code": 1000
}
