      Messages ¶

      Get Messages Metadata ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/messages?0&0&50&&Time&1&1433807257&1433807257&&&cheese&cheese&cheese&cheese&1&1&1&&&&55C131A5.2040501@gmail.com&1
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Total":3,
    "Messages":[
        {
            "ID":"ASnfew8asds92SDnsakr==",
            "Order": 367,
            "Subject":"Hi",
            "Unread":0,
            "Type": 0, // 0 = INBOX, 1 = DRAFT, 2 = SENT, 3 = INBOX_AND_SENT
            "Sender": {
                "Address":"jason@protonmail.dev",
                "Name":"\u79d1\u6280\u798f\u5e03\u65af\u4e2d\u6587\u7f51"
            },
            "ToList":[
                {
                    "Address":"bart.c.butler@gmail.com",
                    "Name":"Bart",
                    "Group": "" // Group name if present and sent/draft
                }
            ],
            "Time":1433627902,
            "Size":54,
            "Location":1, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
            "Starred":0, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
            "HasAttachment":0, // Deprecated, use NumAttachments instead
            "NumAttachments":0,
            "IsEncrypted":5,
            "ExpirationTime":0,
            "IsReplied":0,
            "IsRepliedAll":0,
            "IsForwarded":0,
            "AddressID":"254",
            "CCList":[

            ],
            "BCCList":[

            ],
            "LabelIDs":[
                "1"
            ],
            "ExternalID": null
        },
        {
            "ID":"ASdkjASlfsnnxcvJsdfI==",
            "Order": 3124,
            "Subject":"Hi",
            "Unread":0,
            "Type": 0, // 0 = INBOX, 1 = DRAFT, 2 = SENT, 3 = INBOX_AND_SENT
            "Sender": {
                "Address":"jason@protonmail.dev",
                "Name":"\u79d1\u6280\u798f\u5e03\u65af\u4e2d\u6587\u7f51"
            },
            "ToList":[
                {
                    "Address":"bart.c.butler@gmail.com",
                    "Name":"Bart"
                    "Group": "" // Group name if present and sent/draft
                }
            ],
            "Time":1433627227,
            "Size":54,
            "Location":1, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
            "Starred":0, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
            "HasAttachment":0, // Deprecated, use NumAttachments instead
            "NumAttachments":0,
            "IsEncrypted":5,
            "ExpirationTime":0,
            "IsReplied":0,
            "IsRepliedAll":0,
            "IsForwarded":0,
            "AddressID":"254",
            "CCList":[

            ],
            "BCCList":[

            ],
            "LabelIDs":[
                "1",
                "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w=="
            ],
            "ExternalID": "pr0n@gmail.com"
        },
    ]
}

      Get a list of message metadata
      GET/messages?{Location,Page,PageSize,LabelID,Sort,Desc,Begin,End,BeginID,EndID,Keyword,To,From,Subject,Attachments,Starred,Unread,ConversationID,AddressID,ID,ExternalID,AutoWildcard}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      Location
      integer (optional) Example: 0

      message location 0 => Inbox, 1 => Draft, 2 => Outbox, 3 => Trash, 4 => Spam, 6 => Archive

      Choices: 0 1 2 3 4 6

      Page
      integer (optional) Default: 0 Example: 0

      the page index

      PageSize
      integer (optional) Default: 50 Example: 50

      the page size, maximum 150

      Limit
      integer (optional) Default: 50 

      the number of messages to return, defaults to page size (1 page), maximum 150

      LabelID
      string (optional) Example: <encrypted_label_id>

      label to filter on

      Sort
      string (optional) Default: Time Example: Time

      order key name

      Choices: To From Subject Size Time ID

      Desc
      integer (optional) Default: 1 Example: 1

      0 => ASC, 1 => DESC

      Choices: 0 1

      Begin
      integer (optional) Example: 1433807257

      UNIX timestamp to filter messages earlier than timestamp

      End
      integer (optional) Example: 1433807257

      UNIX timestamp to filter messages later than timestamp

      BeginID
      string (optional) Example: <encrypted_message_id>

      return only messages newer, in creation time (NOT timestamp), than BeginID

      EndID
      string (optional) Example: <encrypted_message_id>

      return only messages older, in creation time (NOT timestamp), than EndID

      Keyword
      string (optional) Example: cheese

      Keyword search of To, CC, BCC, From, Subject

      To
      string (optional) Example: cheese

      Keyword search of To, CC, BCC

      From
      string (optional) Example: cheese

      Keyword search of From

      Subject
      string (optional) Example: cheese

      Keyword search of Subject

      Attachments
      integer (optional) Example: 1

      0 => only no attachments, 1 => only has attachment(s)

      Choices: 0 1

      Starred
      integer (optional) Example: 1

      0 => only unstarred, 1 => only starred

      Choices: 0 1

      Unread
      integer (optional) Example: 1

      0 => only read, 1 => only unread

      Choices: 0 1

      ConversationID
      string (optional) Example: <encrypted_conv_id>

      conversation to filter on

      AddressID
      string (optional) Example: <encrypted_address_id>

      address to filter on

      ID
      string or array (optional) Example: <encrypted_message_id>

      message ID(s) to filter on

      ExternalID
      string (optional) Example: 55C131A5.2040501@gmail.com

      MIME message-id to filter on

      AutoWildcard
      integer (optional) Example: 1

      automatically convert simple queries to wildcarded versions, such as test to *test*

      Get Grouped Message Count ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/messages/count
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Counts": [
    {
      "LabelID": "0",
      "Total": 15,
      "Unread": 6
    },
    {
      "LabelID": "1",
      "Total": 62,
      "Unread": 32
    },
    {
      "LabelID": "2",
      "Total": 10,
      "Unread": 1
    }
  ]
}

      Get grouped message count
      GET/messages/count

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      AddressID
      string (optional) Example: <encrypted_address_id>

      address to filter on

      Get Message ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/messages/ACXDmTaBub14w==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Message":{
        "ID":"I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w==",
        "Order": 367,
        "Subject":"Fw: test",
        "Unread":0,
        "Type": 0, // 0 = INBOX, 1 = DRAFT, 2 = SENT, 3 = INBOX_AND_SENT
        "Sender": {
            "Address":"jason@protonmail.dev",
            "Name":"\u79d1\u6280\u798f\u5e03\u65af\u4e2d\u6587\u7f51"
        },
        "ReplyTo": {
            "Address":"jason@protonmail.dev",
            "Name":"\u79d1\u6280\u798f\u5e03\u65af\u4e2d\u6587\u7f51"
        },
        "ReplyTos": [
            {
                "Address":"jason@protonmail.dev",
                "Name":"\u79d1\u6280\u798f\u5e03\u65af\u4e2d\u6587\u7f51"
            },
            {
                "Address": "example@example.com",
                "Name": "Example McExample"
            }
        ],
        "ToList":[
            {
                "Address":"bart.c.butler@gmail.com",
                "Name":"Bart",
                "Group": "" // Group name if present and sent/draft
            }
        ],
        "Time":1433649408,
        "Size":6959782,
        "Location":1, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
        "Starred":0, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
        "IsEncrypted":5,
        "ExpirationTime":0,
        "IsReplied":0,
        "IsRepliedAll":0,
        "IsForwarded":0,
        "SpamScore": 101,  // 100 is PM spoofed, 101 is dmarc failed
        "AddressID":"222",
        "Body":"-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
        "MIMEType": "text/html",
        "CCList":[

        ],
        "BCCList":[

        ],
        "Header":"(No Header)",
        "Attachments":[
            {
                "ID":"I6hgx3Ol_sdfAs832J2==",
                "Name":"image.jpg",
                "Size": 1503,
                "MIMEType":"image\/jpeg",
                "KeyPackets":"wcBMA6rw6TH9oRKuAQf\/Q3scaoBPjn710+EhfiIP0jF2udWfZ4Thv9TCiaolRMMhivqBpOoeFuyVi6\/LqpibLeVu3karg7zvFTFb+97eWF8ZP8cg8pPjyP4QRclZ4v1hfF1G6Tlw5L3TWt9j5WeMpinjJ3MY0df9WUzf9u+c7AoKNUsfuXHQ4o2ry94ccVYLfm13dw2gEkHxqMkwJ+SHR7vuKADl1EQUzkYjq7+pF3xje4Wwr0Xg+GAcOBQVUcQ3tkbvwZq3\/qxhavP5Pdlei\/8BGUreWQVicKFY5yW3nz+RgHkwqKNwdRnjr1mcFStv45oEicAcccb72FyXuHrhbAzoBmJT2ngQMxUS9+ZsTg==", // Present if attachment is encrypted
                "Headers": {
                    "content-type": "image\/jpeg",
                    "content-transfer-encoding": "base64",
                    "content-disposition": "attachment; filename=\"image.jpg\""
                }
            }
        ],
        "LabelIDs":[
            "1",
            "d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w=="
        ],
        "ExternalID": null
    }
}

      Get message
      GET/messages/{messageid}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      messageid
      "string" (required) Example: ACXDmTaBub14w==

      the message id

      Send Message ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/messages/I6hgx3Ol==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ExpirationTime": 1488351927 // Unix timestamp of expiration of message. 0 for no expiration
    "AutoSaveContacts": 0 // Optionally override the global AutoSaveContact setting for this message
    "Packages" : [
        {
            "Addresses": {
                "bartqa@localhost" : {
                    "Type" : 1, // ProtonMail internal
                    "BodyKeyPacket" : <base64_encoded_key_packet>,
                    "AttachmentKeyPackets" : { // optional if no attachments
                        "<attachment_id>" : <base64_encoded_key_packet>
                    },
                    "Signature" : 0 // 1 = attachment signatures
                },
                "bartqa@gmail.com" : {
                    "Type" : 2, // EO
                    "BodyKeyPacket" : <base64_encoded_key_packet>,
                    "AttachmentKeyPackets" : { // optional if no attachments
                        "<attachment_id>" : <base64_encoded_key_packet>
                    },
                    "Token" : <random_token>,
                    "EncToken" : <encrypted_random_token>,
                    "Auth": {
                        "Version" : 4,
                        "ModulusID" : <encrypted_id>,
                        "Salt" : <base64_encoded_salt>,
                        "Verifier" : <base64_encoded_verifier>
                    },
                    "PasswordHint" : "Example hint", // optional
                    "Signature" : 0 // 1 = attachment signatures
                },
                "random@gmail.com" : {
                    "Type" : 4, // Cleartext inline
                    "Signature" : 0 // 1 = signatures
                },
                "bartqa2@gmail.com" : {
                    "Type" : 8, // Inline PGP
                    "BodyKeyPacket" : <base64_encoded_key_packet>,
                    "AttachmentKeyPackets" : { // optional if no attachments
                        "<attachment_id>" : <base64_encoded_key_packet>
                    },
                    "Signature" : 0 // 1 = attachment signatures
                }
            },
            "Type": 15, // 8|4|2|1, all types sharing this package, a bitmask
            "Body": <base64_encoded_openpgp_encrypted_data_packet>,
            "MIMEType" : "text/html",
            "BodyKey": { // Include only if cleartext recipients
                "Key": <base64_encoded_session_key>,
                "Algorithm": "aes256" // algorithm corresponding to session key
            },
            "AttachmentKeys": {  // Only include if cleartext recipients, optional if no attachments
                "<attachment_id>" : {
                    "Key": <base64_encoded_session_key>,
                    "Algorithm": "aes256" // algorithm corresponding to session key
                }
            },
        },
        {
            "Addresses": {
                "bartqa2@pgp.me" : {
                    "Type" : 16, // PGP/MIME
                    "BodyKeyPacket" : <base64_encoded_key_packet>
                },
                "bartqa3@gmail.com" : {
                    "Type" : 32, // cleartext MIME
                    "Signature" : 0 // 1 = signature
                }
            },
            "Type": 48, // 16|32 MIME sending cannot share packages with inline sending
            "Body": <base64_encoded_openpgp_encrypted_data_packet>,
            "MIMEType" : "multipart/mixed" // Always for MIME,
            "BodyKey": { // Include only if cleartext MIME recipients
                "Key": <base64_encoded_session_key>,
                "Algorithm": "aes256" // algorithm corresponding to session key
            }
        }
    ]
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Sent":{
        "ID":"I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w==",
        "Order": 362,
        "Subject":"Fw: Hi",
        "Unread":0,
        "Type": 2, // 0 = INBOX, 1 = DRAFT, 2 = SENT, 3 = INBOX_AND_SENT
        "Sender": {
            "Address":"jason@protonmail.dev",
            "Name":"\u79d1\u6280\u798f\u5e03\u65af\u4e2d\u6587\u7f51"
        },
        "ReplyTo": {
            "Address":"jason@protonmail.dev",
            "Name":"\u79d1\u6280\u798f\u5e03\u65af\u4e2d\u6587\u7f51"
        },
        "ReplyTos": [
            {
                "Address":"jason@protonmail.dev",
                "Name":"\u79d1\u6280\u798f\u5e03\u65af\u4e2d\u6587\u7f51"
            },
            {
                "Address": "example@example.com",
                "Name": "Example McExample"
            }
        ],
        "ToList":[
            {
                "Address":"bart.c.butler@gmail.com",
                "Name":"Bart",
                "Group": "" // Group name if present and sent/draft
            },
            {
                "Address":"bartqa@localhost",
                "Name":"Bart",
                "Group": "" // Group name if present and sent/draft
            }
        ],
        "Time":1433889144,
        "Size":54,
        "Location":2, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
        "Starred":0, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
        "IsEncrypted":4,
        "ExpirationTime":0,
        "IsReplied":0,
        "IsRepliedAll":0,
        "IsForwarded":0,
        "SpamScore": 0,
        "AddressID":"254",
        "Body":"-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----.*-----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
        "CCList":[

        ],
        "BCCList":[

        ],
        "Header":"(No Header)",
        "Attachments":[

        ],
        "LabelIDs":[
            "2"
        ],
        "ExternalID": null
    },
    "Parent":{  // Present only if the sent message has a parent (reply/reply all/forward)
        "ID":"IasdfDAfl-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w==",
        "IsReplied":0,
        "IsRepliedAll":0,
        "IsForwarded":1
    }
}

      Send a message
      POST/messages/{messageID}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      messageID
      string (required) Example: I6hgx3Ol==

      ID of existing draft

      Create Draft ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/messages
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Message": {
        "ToList":[
            {
                "Name":"Feng",
                "Address":"zhj4478@protonmail.xyz",
                "Group": "MyGroup"
            },
            {
                "Name":"Andy",
                "Address":"andy@protonmail.xyz",
                "Group": "MyGroup"
            }
        ],
        "CCList":[
            {
                "Name":"DCL",
                "Address":"dcl@protonmail.xyz",
                "Group": ""
            }
        ],
        "BCCList":[
            {
                "Name":"Jason",
                "Address":"jason@protonmail.xyz",
                "Group": ""
            }
        ],
        "Subject":"new subject",
        "Body":"-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE----- Version: OpenPGP.js v0.11.0-PM wcBMAygXAAfPdsIGAQf+PBP+Fk0B4+FMdtzKu2iDmv/3JzI4lJLHC9bgyAJH=FH -----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
        "Sender": {
            "Name": "Me",
            "Address": "me@protonmail.com"
        },
        "ExternalID": "ABC.123.ABC@protonmail.com" // Optional, for external clients which insist on their own IDs
    },
    "ParentID": "ollqGCKrny8ciPKA6_egOTiJitX8Wpmw==", // Optional, ID of parent address for reply/reply all/forward
    "Action": {0|1|2}, // Optional, reply = 0, reply all = 1, forward = 2
    "AttachmentKeyPackets" : { // list of attachments to include from parent with corresponding key packets
        "<attachment_id>" : <base64_encoded_key_packet>
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Message":{
        "ID":"KPlISx5MiML3XcSYPrREF-Jw9AFa2kk60Lqw7FVWAGvJUsT_zzWKFI-adgMIhFhPaAukDm9fw3MAOfsds-tfNw==",
        "Order": 456,
        "Subject":"new subject",
        "Unread":1,
        "Type": 1, // 0 = INBOX, 1 = DRAFT, 2 = SENT, 3 = INBOX_AND_SENT
        "Sender": {
            "Address":"me@protonmail.com",
            "Name":"Me"
        },
        "ReplyTo": {
            "Address":"me@protonmail.com",
            "Name":"Me"
        },
        "ReplyTos": [
            {
                "Address":"me@protonmail.com",
                "Name":"Me"
            }
        ],
        "ToList":[
            {
                "Address":"zhj4478@protonmail.xyz",
                "Name":"Feng",
                "Group": "MyGroup"
            },
            {
                "Address":"andy@protonmail.xyz",
                "Name":"Andy",
                "Group": "MyGroup"
            }
        ],
        "Time":1433890289,
        "Size":148,
        "Location":1, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
        "Starred":0, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
        "IsEncrypted":1,
        "ExpirationTime":0,
        "IsReplied":0,
        "IsRepliedAll":0,
        "IsForwarded":0,
        "SpamScore": 0,
        "AddressID":"cO6RgDJwoHFScLqIkVnRD9luDVkh20EDto1aIHVHU43-dJlREzFcUjS-c7bB-_qlnxBgwAShddHZ4UDdu6RswQ==",
        "Body":"-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE----- Version: OpenPGP.js v0.11.0-PM wcBMAygXAAfPdsIGAQf+PBP+Fk0B4+FMdtzKu2iDmv\/3JzI4lJLHC9bgyAJH=FH -----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
        "CCList":[
            {
                "Address":"dcl@protonmail.xyz",
                "Name":"DCL",
                "Group": ""
            }
        ],
        "BCCList":[
            {
                "Address":"jason@protonmail.xyz",
                "Name":"Jason",
                "Group": ""
            }
        ],
        "Header":"(No Header)",
        "Attachments":[

        ],
        "LabelIDs":[
            "1"
        ],
        "ExternalID": null
    }
}

      Create a new draft message
      POST/messages

      Update Draft ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/messages/LDJLSKJlkj==
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
        "Message": {
            "ToList":[
                {
                    "Name":"Feng",
                    "Address":"zhj4478@protonmail.xyz",
                    "Group": "MyGroup"
                },
                {
                    "Name":"Andy",
                    "Address":"andy@protonmail.xyz",
                    "Group": "MyGroup"
                }
            ],
            "CCList":[
                {
                    "Name":"DCL",
                    "Address":"dcl@protonmail.xyz",
                    "Group": ""
                }
            ],
            "BCCList":[
                {
                    "Name":"Jason",
                    "Address":"jason@protonmail.xyz",
                    "Group": ""
                }
            ],
            "Subject":"new subject",
            "Body":"-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE----- Version: OpenPGP.js v0.11.0-PM wcBMAygXAAfPdsIGAQf+PBP+Fk0B4+FMdtzKu2iDmv/3JzI4lJLHC9bgyAJH=FH -----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
            "Sender": {
                "Name": "Me",
                "Address": "me@protonmail.com"
            },
            "ExternalID": "ABC.123.ABC@protonmail.com", // Optional, for external clients which insist on their own IDs
            "AttachmentKeyPackets" : { // optional unless changing sender addres, complete list of new attachment key packets
                "<attachment_id>" : <base64_encoded_key_packet>
            }
        }
    }
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Message":{
        "ID":"KPlISx5MiML3XcSYPrREF-Jw9AFa2kk60Lqw7FVWAGvJUsT_zzWKFI-adgMIhFhPaAukDm9fw3MAOfsds-tfNw==",
        "Order": 323,
        "Subject":"new subject",
        "Unread":1,
        "Type": 1, // 0 = INBOX, 1 = DRAFT, 2 = SENT, 3 = INBOX_AND_SENT
        "Sender": {
            "Address":"me@protonmail.com",
            "Name":"Me"
        },
        "ReplyTo": {
            "Address":"me@protonmail.com",
            "Name":"Me"
        },
        "ReplyTos": [
            {
                "Address":"me@protonmail.com",
                "Name":"Me"
            }
        ],
        "ToList":[
            {
                "Address":"zhj4478@protonmail.xyz",
                "Name":"Feng",
                "Group": "MyGroup"
            },
            {
                "Address":"andy@protonmail.xyz",
                "Name":"Andy",
                "Group": "MyGroup"
            }
        ],
        "Time":1433890289,
        "Size":148,
        "Location":1, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
        "Starred":0, // Deprecated, use LabelIDs instead
        "IsEncrypted":1,
        "ExpirationTime":0,
        "IsReplied":0,
        "IsRepliedAll":0,
        "IsForwarded":0,
        "SpamScore": 0,
        "AddressID":"cO6RgDJwoHFScLqIkVnRD9luDVkh20EDto1aIHVHU43-dJlREzFcUjS-c7bB-_qlnxBgwAShddHZ4UDdu6RswQ==",
        "Body":"-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE----- Version: OpenPGP.js v0.11.0-PM wcBMAygXAAfPdsIGAQf+PBP+Fk0B4+FMdtzKu2iDmv\/3JzI4lJLHC9bgyAJH=FH -----END PGP MESSAGE-----",
        "CCList":[
            {
                "Address":"dcl@protonmail.xyz",
                "Name":"DCL",
                "Group": ""
            }
        ],
        "BCCList":[
            {
                "Address":"jason@protonmail.xyz",
                "Name":"Jason",
                "Group": ""
            }
        ],
        "Header":"(No Header)",
        "Attachments":[

        ],
        "LabelIDs":[
            "1"
        ],
        "ExternalID": null
    }
}

      Update a draft message
      PUT/messages/{messageID}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      messageID
      "string" (required) Example: LDJLSKJlkj==

      the encrypted message id

      Mark Messages as Read ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/messages/read
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "IDs": [
    "KPlISx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==",
    "IwuSjbOUIN105YSvVrdig=="
  ]
}
      Responses200
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "KPlISx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "IwuSjbOUIN105YSvVrdig==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Mark an array of messages as read
      PUT/messages/read

      Mark Messages as Unread ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/messages/unread
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "IDs": [
    "KPlISx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==",
    "IwuSjbOUIN105YSvVrdig=="
  ]
}
      Responses200
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "KPlISx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "IwuSjbOUIN105YSvVrdig==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Mark an array of messages as unread
      PUT/messages/unread

      Delete Messages ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/messages/delete
      Requestsexample 1

      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "IDs": [
    "KPlISx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==",
    "IwuSjbOUIN105YSvVrdig=="
  ]
}
      Responses200
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "KPlISx5MiML3XcSY-tfNw==",

        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "IwuSjbOUIN105YSvVrdig==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Label/Move Messages ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/messages/label
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "LabelID": "ALKJLjalfjl==",
  "IDs": [
    "LKJLalkfejl==",
    "ASia83sJaL=="
  ]
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "LKJLalkfejl==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "ASia83sJaL==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]
}

      Label/move an array of messages

      Unlabel Messages ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/messages/unlabel
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "LabelID": "ALKJLjalfjl==",
  "IDs": [
    "LKJLalkfejl==",
    "ASia83sJaL=="
  ]
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1001,
  "Responses": [
    {
      "ID": "LKJLalkfejl==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "ASia83sJaL==",
      "Response": {
        "Code": 1000
      }
    }
  ]

      Empty Label/Folder ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/messages/empty?1
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete all messages with a label/folder
      DELETE/messages/empty?{LabelID}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      LabelID
      "string" (required) Example: 1

      the label ID, limited to drafts/spam/trash/custom labels/custom folders

      AddressID
      string (optional) Example: <encrypted_address_id>

      address to filter on

      Metrics ¶

      Send Metrics Report ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/metrics
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Log" : "signup",
    "ID" : "29347098_1478812271", // (random digits)_(timestamp of ID creation)
    "Whatever JSON": {
        "you": "want"
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Send Metrics Report
      POST/metrics

      Organizations ¶

      Organization ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/organizations
      Requestsexample
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200401
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Access: application/vnd.protonmail.api+json;apiversion=0
      Body
      {
    "Organization":
    {
        "DisplayName": "My Org",
        "PlanName": "plus",
        "VPNPlanName": null,
        "MaxDomains": 4,
        "MaxAddresses": 20,
        "MaxSpace": 10000000000,
        "MaxMembers": 15,
        "Features": 0, // bits, 1 = catch-all addresses
        "UsedDomains": 0,
        "UsedMembers": 1,
        "UsedAddresses": 0,
        "UsedSpace": 81788997,
        "AssignedSpace": 10000000000
    },
    "Code": 1000
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": "401",
  "Error": "Invalid access token",
  "Details": "{}"
}
      Schema
      {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "Code": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Error": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Details": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}

      Get organization
      GET/organizations

      Get information about current organization

      Organization Name ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/organizations/name
      Requestsexample
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Organization": {
    "DisplayName": "E-Corp"
  }
}
      Responses200401403
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Organization":
    {
        "DisplayName": "E-Corp",
        "PlanName": "plus",
        "VPNPlanName": "vpnplus",
        "MaxDomains": 4,
        "MaxAddresses": 20,
        "MaxSpace": 10000000000,
        "MaxMembers": 15,
        "MaxVPN": 5,
        "Features": 0, // bits, 1 = catch-all addresses
        "UsedDomains": 0,
        "UsedMembers": 1,
        "UsedAddresses": 0,
        "UsedSpace": 81788997,
        "AssignedSpace": 10000000000,
        "UsedVPN": 5,
        "HasKeys": 1
    },
    "Code": 1000
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": "401",
  "Error": "Invalid access token",
  "Details": "{}"
}
      Schema
      {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "Code": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Error": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Details": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": "403",
  "Error": "Access token does not have sufficient scope",
  "Details": "{}"
}
      Schema
      {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "Code": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Error": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Details": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}

      Update organization name
      PUT/organizations/name

      Update current organization name

      Locked route

      Attributes ¶

      • DisplayName (string) … required, organization name, maximum 40 characters

        "DisplayName": "My Organization"

      Organization Keys ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/organizations/keys
      Requestsexample
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200401403
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "PublicKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----\n-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----",
    "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": "401",
  "Error": "Invalid access token",
  "Details": "{}"
}
      Schema
      {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "Code": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Error": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Details": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": "403",
  "Error": "Access token does not have sufficient scope",
  "Details": "{}"
}
      Schema
      {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "Code": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Error": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Details": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}

      Get organization keys
      GET/organizations/keys

      Get PGP keys of the current organization

      Response ¶

      • PublicKey (string) … organization public key

      • PrivateKey (string) … organization private key encrypted with mailbox password hash

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/organizations/keys
      Requestsexample
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral": <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_id>,
    "TwoFactorCode": 203941, // if enabled
    "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
    "BackupPrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
    "BackupKeySalt": "0123456789abcdef",
    "Tokens": [
        {
            "ID" : "G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==",
            "Token": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----\n-----END PGP MESSAGE-----"
        }
    ]
}
      Responses200401403
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": "401",
  "Error": "Invalid access token",
  "Details": "{}"
}
      Schema
      {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "Code": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Error": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Details": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": "403",
  "Error": "Access token does not have sufficient scope",
  "Details": "{}"
}
      Schema
      {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "Code": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Error": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Details": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}

      Create or replace organization keys
      PUT/organizations/keys

      Replace current organization keys and member keys

      Attributes ¶

      • ClientEmphemeral (string) … required, client ephemeral, base64-encoded

        "ClientEphemeral": "G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h=="

      • ClientProof (string) … required, client proof, base64-encoded

        "ClientEphemeral": "G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h=="

      • SRPSession (string) … required, SRP session ID, hex-encoded

        "SRPSession": "abcdef0123456789"

      • TwoFactorCode (integer) … required if enabled

        "SRPSession": "123456"

      • PrivateKey (string) … organization private key encrypted with mailbox password hash

        "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n"

      • BackupPrivateKey (string) … backup private key encrypted with backup password hash

        "BackupPrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n"

      • BackupKeySalt (string) … required, random 16 bytes base64 encoded

        "BackupKeySalt": "0123456789abcdef"

      • Tokens (array) … array of member IDs and tokens

        • ID (string) … MemberKeyID of non-private user MemberKey
        • Token (string) … MemberKey token encrypted with new org key
        {
    "ID": "G1MbEt3Ep5P_EWz8WbHVAOl_6h==",
    "Token": "-----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----\n-----END PGP MESSAGE-----"
}

      Activate Organization Private Key ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/organizations/keys/activate
      Requestsexample
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----"
}
      Responses200401
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": "401",
  "Error": "Invalid access token",
  "Details": "{}"
}
      Schema
      {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "Code": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Error": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Details": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}

      Activate organization private key
      PUT/organizations/keys/activate

      Update inactive private key with new copy encrypted with current mailbox password

      Locked route

      Attributes ¶

      • PrivateKey (string) … organization private key encrypted with mailbox password hash

        "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n"

      Organization Backup Key ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/organizations/keys/backup
      Requestsexample
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200401403
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
  "KeySalt": "0123456789abcdef"
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": "401",
  "Error": "Invalid access token",
  "Details": "{}"
}
      Schema
      {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "Code": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Error": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Details": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": "403",
  "Error": "Access token does not have sufficient scope",
  "Details": "{}"
}
      Schema
      {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "Code": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Error": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Details": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}

      Get backup key
      GET/organizations/keys/backup

      Get current organization backup private key

      Locked route

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/organizations/keys/backup
      Requestsexample
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
  "KeySalt": "0123456789abcdef"
}
      Responses200401403
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": "401",
  "Error": "Invalid access token",
  "Details": "{}"
}
      Schema
      {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "Code": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Error": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Details": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": "403",
  "Error": "Access token does not have sufficient scope",
  "Details": "{}"
}
      Schema
      {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",

      "type": "string"
    },
    "Error": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "Details": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}

      Update backup key
      PUT/organizations/keys/backup

      Update current organization backup private key

      Locked route

      Attributes ¶

      • PrivateKey (string) … organization private key encrypted with backup password hash

        "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----\n"

      • KeySalt (string) … required, random 16 bytes base64 encoded

        "KeySalt": "0123456789abcdef"

      Payments ¶

      Donate ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/donate
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Amount": 100,
    "Currency": "USD",
    "Payment" : { // optional, can use PaymentMethodID if authenticated
        "Type": "card",
        "Details": {
            "Number":4242424242424242,
            "ExpMonth":12,
            "ExpYear":2017,
            "CVC":123,
            "Name":"Sally Seals",
            "Country":"USA",
            "ZIP":94043
        }
    },
    "PaymentMethodID" : "<encrypted_payment_method_id>", // optional, can use instead of Payment if authenticated
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Donate
      POST/payments/donate

      Credit ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/credit
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Amount": 100,
    "Credit": 100, // optional if GiftCode present
    "Currency": "USD", // optional if GiftCode present
    "Payment" : { // optional, can use PaymentMethodID instead
        "Type": "card",
        "Details": {
            "Number":4242424242424242,
            "ExpMonth":12,
            "ExpYear":2017,
            "CVC":123,
            "Name":"Sally Seals",
            "Country":"USA",
            "ZIP":94043
        }
    },
    "PaymentMethodID" : "<encrypted_payment_method_id>", // optional, can use instead of Payment
    "GiftCode" : "ABCDEFHJMNPQRSTV" // optional
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Buy credit
      POST/payments/credit

      Validate Credit ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/credit/check
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Credit": 100, // optional if GiftCode present
    "Currency": "USD", // optional if GiftCode present
    "GiftCode" : "ABCDEFHJMNPQRSTV" // optional
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Currency": "USD",
  "Credit": 100,
  "Gift": -100,
  "AmountDue": 0
}

      Validate credit request
      PUT/payments/credit/check

      Verify ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/verify
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Amount": 100,
    "Credit": 100, // optional if GiftCode present
    "Currency": "USD", // optional if GiftCode present
    "Payment" : { // optional if
        "Type": "card",
        "Details": {
            "Number":4242424242424242,
            "ExpMonth":12,
            "ExpYear":2017,
            "CVC":123,
            "Name":"Sally Seals",
            "Country":"USA",
            "ZIP":94043
        }
    }
    "GiftCode" : "ABCDEFHJMNPQRSTV" // optional
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "VerifyCode": "code_for_account_creation"
}

      Verify
      POST/payments/verify

      Validate Verify ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/verify/check
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Credit": 100, // optional if GiftCode present
    "Currency": "USD", // optional if GiftCode present
    "GiftCode" : "ABCDEFHJMNPQRSTV" // optional
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Currency": "USD",
  "Credit": 100,
  "Gift": -100,
  "AmountDue": 0
}

      Validate verify request
      PUT/payments/verify/check

      Create or Update Subscription ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/subscription
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Amount" : 0,
    "Currency" : "USD",
    "Cycle": 1,
    "Payment" : { // optional if Amount = 0, can also use PaymentMethodID instead
        "Type": "card",
        "Details": {
            "Number":4242424242424242,
            "ExpMonth":12,
            "ExpYear":2017,
            "CVC":123,
            "Name":"Sally Seals",
            "Country":"USA",
            "ZIP":94043
        }
    },
    "PaymentMethodID" : "<encrypted_payment_method_id>", // Optional if Amount = 0, can also use Payment
    "CouponCode" : "HI",
    "GiftCode" : "ABCDEFHJMNPQRSTV", // optional
    "PlanIDs": {
        "<encrypted_plan_id1>": 1, // key is PlanID, value is quantity
        "<encrypted_plan_id2>": 1
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Subscription": {
        "ID": "<encrypted_sub_id>",
        "InvoiceID": "<encrypted_invoice_id>",
        "Cycle": 1,
        "PeriodStart": 1455617471,
        "PeriodEnd": 1458119471,
        "CouponCode": null,
        "Currency": "USD",
        "Amount": 1500,
        "Plans": [
            {
                "ID": "<encrypted_plan_id2>",
                "Type": 1,
                "Cycle": 1,
                "Name": "business",
                "Title": "ProtonMail Business (monthly)",
                "Currency": "USD",
                "Amount": 1000,
                "MaxDomains": 1,
                "MaxAddresses": 5,
                "MaxSpace": 10737418240,
                "MaxMembers": 2,
                "MaxVPN": 0,
                "Services": 1, // bits, 1 = mail, 4 = VPN
                "Features": 1, // bits, 1 = catch-all addresses
                "Quantity": 1
            },
            {
                "ID": "<encrypted_plan_id2>",
                "Type": 0,
                "Cycle": 1,
                "Name": "1member",
                "Title": "+1 Member (monthly)",
                "Currency": "USD",
                "Amount": 500,
                "MaxDomains": 0,
                "MaxAddresses": 0,
                "MaxSpace": 0,
                "MaxMembers": 1,
                "MaxVPN": 0,
                "Services": 1, // bits, 1 = mail, 4 = VPN
                "Features": 0, // bits, 1 = catch-all addresses
                "Quantity": 1
            }
        ]
    },
    "Code": 1000
}

      Create or update subscription
      POST/payments/subscription

      Validate Subscription ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/subscription/check
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "CouponCode" : "HI",
    "GiftCode" : "ABCDEFHJMNPQRSTV", // optional
    "Currency" : "USD",
    "Cycle": 1,
    "PlanIDs": {
        "1001": 1, // key is PlanID, value is quantity
        "1005": 1
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Amount": 1500,
    "AmountDue": 0,
    "Proration": -1448,
    "CouponDiscount": 0,
    "Coupon" : { // null if coupon invalid
        "Code" : "HI",
        "Description" : "Description of HI"
    },
    "Credit": 48,
    "Currency": "USD",
    "Cycle": 1,
    "Gift": -100,
    "Code": 1000
}

      Validate a subscription
      PUT/payments/subscription/check

      Create or Update Payment Method ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/methods
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Type": "card",
  "Details": {
    "Number": 4242424242424242,
    "ExpMonth": 12,
    "ExpYear": 2017,
    "CVC": 123,
    "Name": "Sally Seals",
    "Country": "USA",
    "ZIP": 94043
  }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "PaymentMethod": {
    "ID": "<encrypted_id>",
    "Type": "card",
    "Details": {
      "ExpMonth": 12,
      "ExpYear": 2017,
      "Name": "Sally Seals",
      "Country": "USA",
      "ZIP": 94043,
      "Brand": "Visa",
      "Last4": "4242"
    }
  },
  "Code": 1000
}

      Create or update a payment method
      POST/payments/methods

      Order Payment Methods ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/methods/order
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "PaymentMethodIDs" : [     // Will amend the order of payments with the order of the corresponding PaymentMethodIDs
        "-Bpgivr5H2qGDRiUQ4-7gm5YLf215MEgZCdzOtLW5psxgB8oNc8OnoFRykab4Z23EGEW1ka3GtQPF9xwx9-VUA==",
        "pIJGEYyNFsPEb61otAc47_X8eoSeAfMSokny6dmg3jg2JrcdohiRuWSN2i1rgnkEnZmolVx4Np96IcwxJh1WNw==",
        "l8vWAXHBQmv0u7OVtPbcqMa4iwQaBqowINSQjPrxAr-Da8fVPKUkUcqAq30_BCxj1X0nW70HQRmAa-rIvzmKUA=="
    ],
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      First will be charged for subscriptions
      PUT/payments/methods/order

      Pay Invoice ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/invoices/1050
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Amount" : 52,
    "Currency" : "USD",
    "Payment" : { // optional, can use PaymentMethodID instead
        "Type": "card",
        "Details": {
            "Number":4242424242424242,
            "ExpMonth":12,
            "ExpYear":2017,
            "CVC":123,
            "Name":"Sally Seals",
            "Country":"USA",
            "ZIP":94043
        }
    },
    "PaymentMethodID": "<encrypted_id>" // optional, can use Payment instead
    "GiftCode" : "ABCDEFHJMNPQRSTV" // optional
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Pay an unpaid invoice
      POST/payments/invoices/{id}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      id
      integer (required) Example: 1050

      invoice ID

      Validate Invoice ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/invoices/1050/check
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "GiftCode" : "ABCDEFHJMNPQRSTV" // optional
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Currency": "USD",
  "Amount": 1500,
  "Gift": -100,
  "Credit": -1348,
  "AmountDue": 52,
  "Code": 1000
}

      Compute credit for invoice
      PUT/payments/invoices/{id}/check

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      id
      integer (required) Example: 1050

      invoice ID

      Create PayPal Payment ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/paypal
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token} // Optional
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid} // Optional
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Amount" : 1500,
    "Currency" : "USD" // Only USD allowed for now
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "ApprovalURL": "https://www.sandbox.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_express-checkout&token=EC-8SP67484X0368992Y",
  "Code": 1000
}

      Create payment for Paypal
      POST/payments/paypal

      Create Bitcoin Payment ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/bcinfo
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token} // Optional
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid} // Optional
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Amount": 1500,
  "Currency": "USD"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "AmountBitcoin": 0.0012125469,
  "Address": "18T6LQR2HkCE7v9uyWVjdmXukcXrj9zRMW"
}

      Create payment for Blockchain.info
      POST/payments/bcinfo

      Get Subscription ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/subscription
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Subscription": {
        "ID": "<encrypted_sub_id>",
        "InvoiceID": "1003",
        "Cycle": 1,
        "PeriodStart": 1455617471,
        "PeriodEnd": 1458119471,
        "CouponCode": null,
        "Currency": "USD",
        "Amount": 2500,
        "Plans": [
            {
                "ID": "<encrypted_plan_id2>",
                "Type": 1,
                "Cycle": 1,
                "Name": "business",
                "Title": "ProtonMail Business (monthly)",
                "Currency": "USD",
                "Amount": 1000,
                "MaxDomains": 1,
                "MaxAddresses": 5,
                "MaxSpace": 10737418240,
                "MaxMembers": 2,
                "MaxVPN": 0,
                "Services": 1, // bits, 1 = mail, 4 = VPN
                "Features": 1, // bits, 1 = catch-all addresses
                "Quantity": 1
            },
            {
                "ID": "<encrypted_plan_id2>",
                "Type": 0,
                "Cycle": 1,
                "Name": "1member",
                "Title": "+1 Member (monthly)",
                "Currency": "USD",
                "Amount": 500,
                "MaxDomains": 0,
                "MaxAddresses": 0,
                "MaxSpace": 0,
                "MaxMembers": 1,
                "MaxVPN": 0,
                "Services": 1, // bits, 1 = mail, 4 = VPN
                "Features": 0, // bits, 1 = catch-all addresses
                "Quantity": 3
            }
        ]
        },
    "Code": 1000
}

      Get current subscription
      GET/payments/subscription

      Get Available Plans ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/plans?USD&1
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Plans": [
        {
            "ID": "<encrypted_id>",
            "Type": 1,
            "Cycle": 1,
            "Name": "plus",
            "Title": "ProtonMail+ (monthly)",
            "Currency": "USD",
            "Amount": 500,
            "MaxDomains": 1,
            "MaxAddresses": 5,
            "MaxSpace": 5368709120,
            "MaxMembers": 1,
            "MaxVPN": 0,
            "Services": 1, // bits, 1 = mail, 4 = VPN
            "Features": 0, // bits, 1 = catch-all addresses
            "Quantity": 1
        }
    ]
}

      Get plans available to user
      GET/payments/plans?{Currency,Cycle}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      Currency
      string (required) Example: USD

      ISO currency code

      Cycle
      integer (required) Example: 1

      months in billing cycle

      Get Payment Methods ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/methods
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "PaymentMethods": [
    {
      "ID": "<encrypted_id>",
      "Type": "card",
      "Details": {
        "ExpMonth": 12,
        "ExpYear": 2017,
        "Name": "Sally Seals",
        "Country": "USA",
        "ZIP": 94043,
        "Brand": "Visa",
        "Last4": "1881"
      }
    },
    {
      "ID": "<encrypted_id>",
      "Type": "card",
      "Details": {
        "ExpMonth": 12,
        "ExpYear": 2017,
        "Name": "Sally Seals",
        "Country": "USA",
        "ZIP": 94043,
        "Brand": "Visa",
        "Last4": "4242"
      }
    }
  ],
  "Code": 1000
}

      Get payment methods in priority order
      GET/payments/methods

      Get Invoices ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/invoices?0&25&0&0&0
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Total": 1,
  "Invoices": [
    {
      "ID": "1036",
      "Type": 1,
      "State": 1,
      "Currency": "USD",
      "AmountDue": 0,
      "AmountCharged": 52,
      "CreateTime": 1456599032,
      "ModifyTime": 1456599033,
      "AttemptTime": 1456599034,
      "Attempts": 1
    }
  ],
  "Code": 1000
}

      Get invoices in reverse time order
      GET/payments/invoices?{Page,PageSize,Owner,State,Type}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      Page
      integer (optional) Example: 0

      Page of results

      PageSize
      integer (optional) Example: 25

      Results per page

      Owner
      integer (optional) Example: 0

      User = 0, Organization = 1

      State
      integer (optional) Example: 0

      Unpaid = 0, Paid = 1, Void = 2, Billed = 3

      Type
      integer (optional) Example: 0

      Other = 0, Subscription = 1, Cancellation = 2, Credit = 3, Donation = 4

      Get Invoice ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/invoices/1050?A4
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Disposition: attachment; filename = "Invoice.pdf"
      Content-Type: application/pdf
      Content-Length: 1532
      Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary
      Body
      {pdf_file_content}

      Get an Invoice as PDF
      GET/payments/invoices/{id}?{PaperSize}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      id
      integer (required) Example: 1050

      invoice ID

      PaperSize
      string (optional) Example: A4

      Letter, Legal, A3, A4

      Delete Subscription ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/subscription
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete current subscription and organization, locked
      DELETE/payments/subscription

      Delete Payment Method ¶

      DELETE https://api.protonmail.ch/payments/methods/
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Delete payment method
      DELETE/payments/methods/{id}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      id
      string (required) Example: <encrypted_id>

      encrypted ID of method

      Reports ¶

      Report Bug ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/reports/bug
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      ----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="OS"

iOS
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="OSVersion"

8.0.3
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Client"

Web
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="ClientVersion"

2.0.0
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="ClientType"

1 // 1 = email, 2 = VPN
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Title"

My issue title
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Description"

Some text here
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Username"

4w350m3h4x0r
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Email"

derp@gmail.com
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Country"

MK
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="ISP"

Makedonski Telekom AD-Skopje
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="MyAttachment"; filename="logs.txt"
Content-Type: text/plain

{attachment contents}
----WebKitFormBoundary7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Report a bug
      POST/reports/bug

      Report Crash ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/reports/crash
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "OS": "iOS", // Optional
    "OSVersion" : "8.0.3", // Optional
    "Browser": "Safari", // Optional
    "BrowserVersion" : "8", // Optional
    "Client": "Web", // Client should supply
    "ClientVersion" : "2.0.0", // Client should supply
    "ClientType" : 1 // 1 = email, 2 = VPN
    "Debug": { // Client should supply
        "Whatever JSON": "you want"
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Report a client crash
      POST/reports/crash

      Report Crash via Sentry Proxy ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/reports/sentry/api/:sentry_project_id/store/
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      The interface proxies request generated by a Sentry client to a configured
Sentry server.

See: https://docs.sentry.io/clientdev/
      Responses

      Report a client crash via Sentry Proxy
      POST/reports/sentry/api/:sentry_project_id/store/

      Report CSP violation ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/reports/csp
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "csp-report": {
    "document-uri": "http://example.com/signup.html",
    "referrer": "",
    "blocked-uri": "http://example.com/css/style.css",
    "violated-directive": "style-src cdn.example.com",
    "original-policy": "default-src 'none'; style-src cdn.example.com; report-uri /_/csp-reports"
  }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Report a CSP violation
      POST/reports/csp

      Report Phishing ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/reports/phishing
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "MessageID": "I6hgx3Ol-d3HYa3E394T_ACXDmTaBub14w==",
    "MIMEType" : "text/html", // or text/plain
    "Body": "<decrypted message body>"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Report a phishing email
      POST/reports/phishing

      Reset ¶

      Reset Token Validate ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/reset/bob/983c8a169ba7ee02
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Addresses": [
    {
      "ID": "xRvCGwFq_TW7i8FtJaGyFEq0g==",
      "Email": "jason@protonmail.dev",
      "Send": 1,
      "Status": 1
    }
  ]
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 12031,
  "Error": "Invalid reset token",
  "Details": {}
}

      Validate reset token
      GET/reset/{username}/{token}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      username
      "string" (required) Example: bob
      token
      "string" (required) Example: 983c8a169ba7ee02

      16-character reset token

      Request Login Reset Token ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/reset
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Username": "derp",
  "NotificationEmail": "derp@gmail.com"
}
      Responses200200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 12040,
  "Error": "Username and notification email mismatch",
  "Details": {}
}

      Request login reset token
      POST/reset

      Send Username ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/reset/username
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "NotificationEmail": "derp@derp.com"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Send usernames to notification email
      POST/reset/username

      Setting ¶

      Get Settings ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/settings
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "UserSettings": {
        "PasswordMode": 1,
        "Email": {
            "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 1,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "Phone": {
            "Value": "+18005555555",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "News": 244,
        "Locale": "en_US",
        "LogAuth": 2,
        "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
        "TwoFactor": 1,
        "TOTP": 0,
        "U2FKeys": [
            {
                "Label": "A name",
                "KeyHandle": "aKeyHandle",
                "Compromised": 0 // or 1
            }
        ]
    }
}

      Get general settings
      GET/settings

      Update Password ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/password
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral": <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_id>,
    "TwoFactorCode": 203941, // if enabled
    "Auth": {
        "Version" : 4,
        "ModulusID" : <encrypted_id>,
        "Salt" : <base64_encoded_salt>,
        "Verifier" : <base64_encoded_verifier>
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "UserSettings": {
    "PasswordMode": 1,
    "Email": {
      "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 1,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "Phone": {
      "Value": "+18005555555",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 0,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "News": 244,
    "Locale": "en_US",
    "LogAuth": 2,
    "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
    "TOTP": 0,
    "TwoFactor": 0,
    "U2FKeys": []
  }
}

      Update login password
      PUT/settings/password

      Upgrade Password ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/password/upgrade
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Auth": {
        "Version" : 4,
        "ModulusID" : <encrypted_id>,
        "Salt" : <base64_encoded_salt>,
        "Verifier" : <base64_encoded_verifier>
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "UserSettings": {
    "PasswordMode": 1,
    "Email": {
      "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 1,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "Phone": {
      "Value": "+18005555555",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 0,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "News": 244,
    "Locale": "en_US",
    "LogAuth": 2,
    "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
    "TOTP": 0,
    "TwoFactor": 0,
    "U2FKeys": []
  }
}

      Upgrade login password on login if version < 4
      PUT/settings/password/upgrade

      Update Email ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/email
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral": <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_key>,
    "TwoFactorCode": 203941, // if enabled
    "Email": "abc@gmail.com"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "UserSettings": {
    "PasswordMode": 1,
    "Email": {
      "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 1,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "Phone": {
      "Value": "+18005555555",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 0,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "News": 244,
    "Locale": "en_US",
    "LogAuth": 2,
    "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
    "TOTP": 0,
    "TwoFactor": 0,
    "U2FKeys": []
  }
}

      Update email
      PUT/settings/email

      Update Notify By Email ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/email/notify
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Notify": {0|1}
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "UserSettings": {
    "PasswordMode": 1,
    "Email": {
      "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 1,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "Phone": {
      "Value": "+18005555555",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 0,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "News": 244,
    "Locale": "en_US",
    "LogAuth": 2,
    "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
    "TOTP": 0,
    "TwoFactor": 0,
    "U2FKeys": []
  }
}

      Turn on/off email notifications
      PUT/settings/email/notify

      Update Password Reset By Email ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/email/reset
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
