      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral": <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_key>,
    "TwoFactorCode": 203941, // if enabled
    "Reset" : 1 // 0 for off, 1 for on
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "UserSettings": {
        "PasswordMode": 1,
        "Email": [
            "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 1,
            "Reset": 1
        ],
        "Phone": {
            "Value": "+18005555555",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "News": 244,
        "Locale": "en_US",
        "LogAuth": 2,
        "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
        "TOTP": 0,
        "TwoFactor": 0,
        "U2FKeys": []
    }
}

      Enable or disable login password reset by email
      PUT/settings/email/reset

      Verify Email ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/email/verify
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Token": "<token_value>"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "UserSettings": {
        "PasswordMode": 1,
        "Email": [
            "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
            "Status": 1,
            "Notify": 1,
            "Reset": 1
        ],
        "Phone": {
            "Value": "+18005555555",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "News": 244,
        "Locale": "en_US",
        "LogAuth": 2,
        "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
        "TOTP": 0,
        "TwoFactor": 0,
        "U2FKeys": []
    }
}

      Verify associated email address
      POST/settings/email/verify

      Update Phone ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/phone
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral": <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_key>,
    "TwoFactorCode": 203941, // if enabled
    "Phone": "+18005555555"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "UserSettings": {
    "PasswordMode": 1,
    "Email": {
      "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 1,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "Phone": {
      "Value": "+18005555555",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 0,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "News": 244,
    "Locale": "en_US",
    "LogAuth": 2,
    "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
    "TOTP": 0,
    "TwoFactor": 0,
    "U2FKeys": []
  }
}

      Update phone
      PUT/settings/phone

      Update Notify By Phone ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/phone/notify
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Notify": {0|1}
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "UserSettings": {
    "PasswordMode": 1,
    "Email": {
      "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 1,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "Phone": {
      "Value": "+18005555555",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 0,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "News": 244,
    "Locale": "en_US",
    "LogAuth": 2,
    "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
    "TOTP": 0,
    "TwoFactor": 0,
    "U2FKeys": []
  }
}

      Turn on/off phone notifications
      PUT/settings/phone/notify

      Update Password Reset By Phone ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/phone/reset
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral": <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_key>,
    "TwoFactorCode": 203941, // if enabled
    "Reset" : 1 // 0 for off, 1 for on
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "UserSettings": {
        "PasswordMode": 1,
        "Email": [
            "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 1,
            "Reset": 1
        ],
        "Phone": {
            "Value": "+18005555555",
            "Status": 1,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Reset": 1
        },
        "News": 244,
        "Locale": "en_US",
        "LogAuth": 2,
        "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
        "TOTP": 0,
        "TwoFactor": 0,
        "U2FKeys": []
    }
}

      Enable or disable login password reset by phone
      PUT/settings/phone/reset

      Verify Phone ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/phone/verify
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Token": "<token_value>"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "UserSettings": {
        "PasswordMode": 1,
        "Email": [
            "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 1,
            "Reset": 1
        ],
        "Phone": {
            "Value": "+18005555555",
            "Status": 1,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "News": 244,
        "Locale": "en_US",
        "LogAuth": 2,
        "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
        "TOTP": 0,
        "TwoFactor": 0,
        "U2FKeys": []
    }
}

      Verify associated phone number
      POST/settings/phone/verify

      Update Locale ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/locale
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Locale": "en_US"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "UserSettings": {
    "PasswordMode": 1,
    "Email": {
      "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 1,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "Phone": {
      "Value": "+18005555555",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 0,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "News": 244,
    "Locale": "en_US",
    "LogAuth": 2,
    "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
    "TOTP": 0,
    "TwoFactor": 0,
    "U2FKeys": []
  }
}

      Update locale
      PUT/settings/locale

      Update Log Auth ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/logauth
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "LogAuth" : 0 // 0 = off, 1 = on, 2 = on with IP logging
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "UserSettings": {
    "PasswordMode": 1,
    "Email": {
      "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 1,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "Phone": {
      "Value": "+18005555555",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 0,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "News": 244,
    "Locale": "en_US",
    "LogAuth": 2,
    "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
    "TOTP": 0,
    "TwoFactor": 0,
    "U2FKeys": []
  }
}

      Update authentication logging
      PUT/settings/logauth

      Update News ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/news
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "News" : 255 // 0 - 255 bitmap. 1 is announcements, 2 is features, 4 is newsletter. 16, 32, 64, and 128 are currently unused.
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "UserSettings": {
    "PasswordMode": 1,
    "Email": {
      "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 1,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "Phone": {
      "Value": "+18005555555",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 0,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "News": 255,
    "Locale": "en_US",
    "LogAuth": 2,
    "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
    "TOTP": 0,
    "TwoFactor": 0,
    "U2FKeys": []
  }
}

      Update newsletter subscription
      PUT/settings/news

      Update Invoice Text ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/invoicetext
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "InvoiceText" : "Mickey Mouse, Esq.\r\nCartoon Law Services" // Maximum 5 lines
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "UserSettings": {
    "PasswordMode": 1,
    "Email": {
      "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 1,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "Phone": {
      "Value": "+18005555555",
      "Status": 0,
      "Notify": 0,
      "Reset": 0
    },
    "News": 244,
    "Locale": "en_US",
    "LogAuth": 2,
    "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
    "TOTP": 0,
    "TwoFactor": 0,
    "U2FKeys": []
  }
}

      Update invoice user-defined text
      PUT/settings/invoicetext

      Signup for U2F ¶

      Two steps are needed: first creating a challenge, then verifying the challenge resolution.

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/2fa/u2f
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "RegisteredKeys": [{
        "Version": "U2F_V2",
        "KeyHandle": <aKeyHandle>
    }],
    "Challenge": <challenge>,
    "Versions": ["U2F_V2"]
}

      creating a challenge for initial key registering
      GET/settings/2fa/u2f

      RegisteredKeys is an array of keys that are currently registered (this is necessary to return because this is how the key that is currently being registered can determine whether it has already been registered)

      Versions indicates the key versions supported by the server

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/2fa/u2f
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral": <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_key>,
    "ClientData": <identifies_challenge>
    "RegistrationData": "1046-length string",
    "Version": "U2F_V2"
}
      Responses200400
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "TwoFactorRecoveryCodes":  [
    01234567,
    12345678,
    ... //16 alphanumeric codes, each 8 characters long
    23456789
    ],
    "ServerProof":<base64_encoded_proof>,
    "UserSettings": {
        "PasswordMode": 1,
        "Email": {
            "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 1,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "Phone": {
            "Value": "+18005555555",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "News": 244,
        "Locale": "en_US",
        "LogAuth": 2,
        "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
        "TOTP": 1,
        "TwoFactor": 1,
        "U2FKeys": []
    },
    "Code": 1000
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 12061,
  "Error": "Two Factor confirmation failed",
  "Details": {}
}

      Completing the registration challenge and storing the key
      POST/settings/2fa/u2f

      The scope password is used.

      • The first three parameters are SRP params (this route should probably be password-protected)

      • ClientData contains the server challenge

      • RegistrationData is the response to the server challenge

      • Version is the challenge version that was responded to

      Signup for TOTP ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/2fa/totp
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral": <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_key>,
    "U2F": {
        "KeyHandle" : <aKeyHandle>,
        "ClientData": "1046-length string",
            "SignatureData": "theSignatureData"
    },
    "TwoFactorCode": 123456, // either this or the U2F object
    "TOTPSharedSecret":"JBSWY3DPEHPK3PXP",
    "TOTPConfirmation": 203941
        // For older client, if TOTPConfirmation is *not*
        // given, TwoFactorCode will be used
}
      Responses200400
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "TwoFactorRecoveryCodes":  [
    01234567,
    12345678,
    ... //16 alphanumeric codes, each 8 characters long
    23456789
    ],
    "ServerProof":<base64_encoded_proof>,
    "UserSettings": {
        "PasswordMode": 1,
        "Email": {
            "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 1,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "Phone": {
            "Value": "+18005555555",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "News": 244,
        "Locale": "en_US",
        "LogAuth": 2,
        "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
        "TOTP": 1,
        "TwoFactor": 1,
        "U2FKeys": []
    },
    "Code": 1000
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 10041,
  "Error": "Two Factor confirmation failed",
  "Details": {}
}

      Signup for TOTP
      POST/settings/2fa/totp

      Regenerate codes ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/2fa/codes
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral": "<base64_encoded_ephemeral>",
    "ClientProof": "<base64_encoded_proof>",
    "SRPSession": "<hex_encoded_session_key>",
    "U2F": {
        "KeyHandle" : <aKeyHandle>,
        "ClientData": "1046-length string",
            "SignatureData": "theSignatureData"
    },
    "TwoFactorCode": 123456 // either this or the U2F object
}
      Responses200400
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "TwoFactorRecoveryCodes":  [
    01234567,
    12345678,
    ... //16 alphanumeric codes, each 8 characters long
    23456789
    ],
    "ServerProof":<base64_encoded_proof>,
    "UserSettings": {
        "PasswordMode": 1,
        "Email": {
            "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 1,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "Phone": {
            "Value": "+18005555555",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "News": 244,
        "Locale": "en_US",
        "LogAuth": 2,
        "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
        "TOTP": 1,
        "TwoFactor": 1,
        "U2FKeys": []
    },
    "Code": 1000
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 10041,
  "Error": "Two Factor confirmation failed",
  "Details": {}
}

      Regenerate codes
      POST/settings/2fa/codes

      Replace current recovery codes with new ones.

      Disable 2FA ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/2fa
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral": <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_key>,
    "U2F": {
            "KeyRegistration" : <key_registration>,
            "ChallengeData": "1046-length string",
                "Version": "U2F_V2"
    },
    "TwoFactorCode": 203941 //either this or the U2F object
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "ServerProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "Code": 1000,
    "UserSettings": {
        "PasswordMode": 1,
        "Email": {
            "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 1,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "Phone": {
            "Value": "+18005555555",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "News": 244,
        "Locale": "en_US",
        "LogAuth": 2,
        "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
        "TOTP": 0,
        "TwoFactor": 0,
        "U2FKeys": []
    }
}

      Disable 2FA
      PUT/settings/2fa

      Disables all the 2FA methods.

      Disable U2F ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/u2f/
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral": <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_key>,
    "U2F": {
            "KeyRegistration" : <key_registration>,
            "ChallengeData": "1046-length string",
                "Version": "U2F_V2"
    },
    "TwoFactorCode": 203941 //either this or the U2F object
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "ServerProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "Code": 1000,
    "UserSettings": {
        "PasswordMode": 1,
        "Email": {
            "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 1,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "Phone": {
            "Value": "+18005555555",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "News": 244,
        "Locale": "en_US",
        "LogAuth": 2,
        "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
        "TOTP": 0,
        "TwoFactor": 0,
        "U2FKeys": []
    }
}

      Remove a U2F device
      PUT/settings/u2f/

      Removing a U2F device identified by key_handle. Deletes the recovery codes if this U2F device was the last 2FA method.

      Disable TOTP ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/totp
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral": <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_key>,
    "U2F": {
            "KeyRegistration" : <key_registration>,
            "ChallengeData": "1046-length string",
                "Version": "U2F_V2"
    },
    "TwoFactorCode": 203941 //either this or the U2F object
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "ServerProof": <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "Code": 1000,
    "UserSettings": {
        "PasswordMode": 1,
        "Email": {
            "Value": "abc@gmail.com",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 1,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "Phone": {
            "Value": "+18005555555",
            "Status": 0,
            "Notify": 0,
            "Reset": 0
        },
        "News": 244,
        "Locale": "en_US",
        "LogAuth": 2,
        "InvoiceText": "रिवार में हुआ। ज檷\r\nCartoon Law Services\r\n1 DisneyWorld Lane\r\nOrlando, FL, 12345\r\nVAT blahblahlblahblah",
        "TOTP": 0,
        "TwoFactor": 0,
        "U2FKeys": []
    }
}

      Disable TOTP
      PUT/settings/totp

      Disables TOTP. Deletes recovery codes if TOTP was the last recovery method.

      Request Reset 2FA ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/2fa/reset
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Username" : "user_name",
    "Token" : "983c8a169ba7ee02" // Reset token
}
      Responses200400
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 19502,
  "Error": "Invalid reset token. Please request another token and try again",
  "Details": {}
}

      Request Reset 2FA
      POST/settings/2fa/reset

      Mail Setting ¶

      Get Mail Settings ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 1,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Get mail settings
      GET/settings/mail

      Update Signature ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/signature
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Signature": "come from feng"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "come from feng",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 1,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update signature message
      PUT/settings/mail/signature

      Update Display Name ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/display
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "DisplayName": "test name"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "test name",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 1,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update display name
      PUT/settings/mail/display

      Update Theme ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/theme
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Theme": "<CSS or null string here>"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS or null string here>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 1,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update theme
      PUT/settings/mail/theme

      Update AutoSaveContacts ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/autocontacts
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "AutoSaveContacts": {0|1}
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 1,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Turn on/off autosave contacts
      PUT/settings/mail/autocontacts

      Update Composer Mode ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/composermode
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ComposerMode" : 0 // 0 or 1
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 1,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update composer mode
      PUT/settings/mail/composermode

      Update Message Button Style ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/messagebuttons
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "MessageButtons" : 0 // 0 or 1
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 1,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update message buttons style
      PUT/settings/mail/messagebuttons

      Update Show Images ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/images
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ShowImages" : 0 // 0 for none, 1 for remote, 2 for embedded, 3 for remote and embedded
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update images bits
      PUT/settings/mail/images

      Update Show Moved ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/moved
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ShowMoved" : 0 // 0 for none, 1 for drafts, 2 for sent, 3 for drafts and sent
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update show moved bits
      PUT/settings/mail/moved

      Update View Mode ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/viewmode
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ViewMode" : 0 // 0 or 1
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update View Layout ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/viewlayout
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ViewLayout" : 0 // 0 or 1
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,

        "Autocrypt": 1,

      Update Swipe Left ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/swipeleft
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "SwipeLeft" : 0 // between 0 and 4 inclusive
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update swipe left flag
      PUT/settings/mail/swipeleft

      Update Swipe Right ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/swiperight
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "SwipeRight" : 0 // between 0 and 4 inclusive
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 0,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"

      Update Also Archive ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/alsoarchive
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "AlsoArchive" : 1 // 0 for off, 1 for on
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update default setting for archiving when applying labels
      PUT/settings/mail/alsoarchive

      Update Hotkeys ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/hotkeys
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Hotkeys" : 1 // 0 for off, 1 for on
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update hotkeys flag
      PUT/settings/mail/hotkeys

      Update PM Signature ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/pmsignature
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "PMSignature" : 1 // 0 for off, 1 for on
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
             "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
             "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
             "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
             "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
             "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
             "Message": "",
             "IsEnabled: false,
             "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update PM Signature flag
      PUT/settings/mail/pmsignature

      Update Autoresponder ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/autoresponder
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "AutoResponder" : { 
        "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
        "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
        "Repeat": 1, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
        "DaysSelected": [0, 1, 5, 6], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
        "Subject": "Aw", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
        "Message": "I'm not here.",
        "IsEnabled: true,
        "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "MailSettings": {
    "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
    "Signature": "Your signature here",
    "Theme": "<CSS>",
    "AutoResponder": {
      "StartTime": 0,
      "Endtime": 0,
      "Repeat": 1,
      "DaysSelected": [
        0,
        1,
        5,
        6
      ],
      "Subject": "Aw",
      "Message": "I'm not here.",
      "IsEnabled": true,
      "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
    },
    "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
    "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
    "ComposerMode": 1,
    "MessageButtons": 0,
    "ShowImages": 0,
    "ShowMoved": 3,
    "ViewMode": 0,
    "ViewLayout": 0,
    "SwipeLeft": 0,
    "SwipeRight": 3,
    "AlsoArchive": 0,
    "Hotkeys": 1,
    "PMSignature": 1,
    "ImageProxy": 0,
    "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
    "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
    "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
    "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
  }
}

      Update Autoresponder
      PUT/settings/mail/autoresponder

      Update Auto-Wildcard Search ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/autowildcard
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "AutoWildcardSearch": 0 // 0 for off, 1 for on
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update Auto-Wildcard Search
      PUT/settings/mail/autowildcard

      Update Draft Type ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/drafttype
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "MIMEType": "text/html" // or "text/plain"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update Receive Type ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/receivetype
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "MIMEType": "text/html" // or "text/plain"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update Show Type ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/showtype
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "MIMEType": "text/html" // or "text/plain"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }

      Update Image Proxy ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/imageproxy
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ImageProxy": 0 // 0 for off, 1 for on
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,

        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,

      Update TLS ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/tls
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "TLS": 0 // 0 for opportunistic TLS, 1 for require TLS, 2 for require DANE
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update TLS
      PUT/settings/mail/tls

      Update Right to Left ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/righttoleft
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "RightToLeft": 0 // 0 for off, 1 for on
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/attachpublic
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "AttachPublicKey": 0 // 0 for off, 1 for on
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"

      Update attach public key preference
