      Update Default Signing ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/sign
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Sign": 0 // 0 for off, 1 for on
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update default signing
      PUT/settings/mail/sign

      Update Default PGP Scheme ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/pgpscheme
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "PGPScheme": 16 // 16 for PGP MIME, 8 for inline PGP
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update default PGP scheme
      PUT/settings/mail/pgpscheme

      Update Prompt Pin ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/promptpin
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "PromptPin": 0 // 0 for off, 1 for on
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update key pinning prompt preference
      PUT/settings/mail/promptpin

      Update Autocrypt ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/mail/autocrypt
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Autocrypt": 0 // 0 for off, 1 for on
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "MailSettings": {
        "DisplayName": "Put Chinese Here",
        "Signature": "Your signature here",
        "Theme": "<CSS>",
        "AutoResponder": { 
            "StartTime": 0, // seconds relative to the start of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Endtime" :  0, // seconds relative to the end of the period (unix timestamp for fixed interval)
            "Repeat": 0, // Mode: 0 => fixed interval, 1 => daily, 2 => weekly, 3 => monthly, 4 => permanent
            "DaysSelected": [], // For daily mode: the day of the week expressed as an integer between 0 and 6. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
            "Subject": "Auto", // The subject prefix: e.g. "Re" for "Re: <original subject>"
            "Message": "",
            "IsEnabled: false,
            "Zone": "Europe/Zurich"
        },
        "AutoSaveContacts": 1,
        "AutoWildcardSearch": 1,
        "ComposerMode": 1,
        "MessageButtons": 0,
        "ShowImages": 0,
        "ShowMoved": 3,
        "ViewMode": 0,
        "ViewLayout": 0,
        "SwipeLeft": 0,
        "SwipeRight": 3,
        "AlsoArchive": 0,
        "Hotkeys": 1,
        "PMSignature": 1,
        "ImageProxy": 0,
        "TLS": 0,
        "RightToLeft": 0,
        "AttachPublicKey": 0,
        "Sign": 0,
        "PGPScheme": 16,
        "PromptPin": 1,
        "Autocrypt": 1,
        "NumMessagePerPage": 50,
        "DraftMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ReceiveMIMEType": "text/html",
        "ShowMIMEType": "text/html"
    }
}

      Update Autocrypt header sending preference
      PUT/settings/mail/autocrypt

      VPN Setting ¶

      Get VPN Settings ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/vpn
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "VPNSettings": {
        "Name": "jason1",
        "Password": "123",
        "GroupID": "jason",
        "Status": 1, // 0 = no vpn access, 1 = vpn access, 2 = vpn access eligible, 3 = vpn access requested (waitlist)
        "ExpirationTime": 0, // only relevant for 'trial' plan, timestamp if non-zero
        "PlanName": "visionary", // other plans include 'free' and 'trial'
        "MaxConnect": 10,
        "MaxTier": 2
    }
}

      Get VPN settings
      GET/settings/vpn

      Update VPN Name ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/vpn/name
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "VPNName": "jason1"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "VPNSettings": {
        "Name": "jason1",
        "Password": "123",
        "GroupID": "jason",
        "Status": 1, // 0 = no vpn access, 1 = vpn access, 2 = vpn access eligible, 3 = vpn access requested (waitlist)
        "ExpirationTime": 0, // only relevant for 'trial' plan, timestamp if non-zero
        "PlanName": "visionary", // other plans include 'free' and 'trial'
        "MaxConnect": 10,
        "MaxTier": 2
    }
}

      Update VPN name, locked route
      PUT/settings/vpn/name

      Update VPN Password ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/settings/vpn/password
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "VPNPassword": "123"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "VPNSettings": {
        "Name": "jason1",
        "Password": "123",
        "GroupID": "jason",
        "Status": 1, // 0 = no vpn access, 1 = vpn access, 2 = vpn access eligible, 3 = vpn access requested (waitlist)
        "ExpirationTime": 0, // only relevant for 'trial' plan, timestamp if non-zero
        "PlanName": "visionary", // other plans include 'free' and 'trial'
        "MaxConnect": 10,
        "MaxTier": 2
    }
}

      Update VPN pasword, locked route
      PUT/settings/vpn/password

      User ¶

      Get Username Available with Suggestions ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/users/available?Name=bart
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200400400
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 12106,
  "Error": "Username already used",
  "Details": {
    "Suggestions": [
      "bart9",
      "bart8",
      "bart1"
    ]
  }
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 12104,
  "Error": "Special chars at the end of the username",
  "Details": {}
}

      Check if username already taken
      GET/users/available?Name={user_name}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      user_name
      "string" (required) Example: bart

      the username

      Suggestions
      `Code === 12106` (required) Example: if the username status is `already used`

      Get Direct Enabled ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/users/direct?1
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Direct": 1,   // 1 if enabled, 0 if disabled--client should show invite form
    "VerifyMethods": [
        "captcha",
        "email",
        "sms"
    ]
}

      Check if direct user signups are enabled
      GET/users/direct?{Type}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      Type
      integer (optional) Example: 1

      1 => mail, 2 => VPN

      Choices: 0 1

      Get User Info ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/users
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "User": {
    "ID": "MJLke8kWh1BBvG95JBIrZvzpgsZ94hNNgjNHVyhXMiv4g9cn6SgvqiIFR5cigpml2LD_iUk_3DkV29oojTt3eA==",
    "Name": "jason",
    "UsedSpace": 96691332,
    "Currency": "USD",
    "Credit": 0,
    "MaxSpace": 10737418240,
    "MaxUpload": 26214400,
    "Role": 2,
    "Private": 1,
    "Subscribed": 1,
    "Services": 1,
    "Delinquent": 0,
    "Keys": [
      {
        "ID": "IlnTbqicN-2HfUGIn-ki8bqZfLqNj5ErUB0z24Qx5g-4NvrrIc6GLvEpj2EPfwGDv28aKYVRRrSgEFhR_zhlkA==",
        "Version": 3,
        "PrivateKey": "-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----*-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----",
        "Fingerprint": "c93f767df53b0ca8395cfde90483475164ec6353",
        "Activation": null,
        "Primary": 1
      }
    ]
  },
  "Code": 1000
}

      Get user's info
      GET/users

      Get Human Verification Options ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/users/human
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "VerifyMethods": [
    "captcha"
  ]
}

      Get options for human verification
      GET/users/human

      Create User ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/users
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Username" : "user_name",
    "Email": "notification@email",
    "Token" : "<token value>",
    "TokenType" : "captcha", // or "email", "sms", "invite", or "payment",
    "Referrer" : "identifier" // optional, give referrer credit,
    "Type" : 1 // 1 = mail, 2 = VPN
    "Auth": {
        "Version" : 4,
        "ModulusID" : <encrypted_id>,
        "Salt" : <base64_encoded_salt>,
        "Verifier" : <base64_encoded_verifier>
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "User": {
    "ID": "<encrypted_id>",
    "Name": "user_name",
    "UsedSpace": 0,
    "Currency": "USD",
    "Credit": 0,
    "MaxSpace": 524288000,
    "MaxUpload": 26214400,
    "Role": 0,
    "Private": 1,
    "Subscribed": 0,
    "Delinquent": 0,
    "Keys": []
  }
}

      Create user
      POST/users

      User creation token check ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/users/check
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Token" : "<token value>",
    "TokenType" : "captcha", // or "email", "sms", "invite", "coupon" or "payment",
    "Type" : 1 // 1 = mail, 2 = VPN
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Plans": [ // will only appear with successful coupon token checks
        {
            "ID": "S6oNe_lxq3GNMIMFQdAwOOk5wNYpZwGjBHFr5mTNp9aoMUaCRNsefrQt35mIg55iefE3fTq8BnyM4znqoVrAyA==",
            "Type": 1,
            "Name": "vpnplus",
            "Title": "ProtonVPN Plus",
            "MaxDomains": 0,
            "MaxAddresses": 0,
            "MaxSpace": 0,
            "MaxMembers": 0,
            "MaxVPN": 5,
            "Services": 4,
            "Features": 0,
            "Cycle": 1,
            "Currency": "USD",
            "Amount": 1000,
            "Quantity": 1
        }
    ]
}

      Check user creation token validity
      PUT/users/check

      Send Verification Code ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/users/code
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Type": "email", // email or sms
    "Platform": "ios", // Optional, can use "android" as well if link support
    "Destination": {
        "Address": "example@example.com" // required if type is email
        "Phone" : "6176767087" // required if type is sms
    }
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Send a verification code
      POST/users/code

      User human verification ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/users/human
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Token": "<token value>",
  "TokenType": "captcha"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
        "Code": 1000,
    }

      Verify user is human
      POST/users/human

      Lock sensitive settings ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/users/lock
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000
}

      Lock sensitive settings for keys/organization
      PUT/users/lock

      Unlock sensitive settings ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/users/unlock
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral" : <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof" : <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_id>,
}
      Responses

      Unlock sensitive settings for keys/organization
      PUT/users/unlock

      Unlock password changes ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/users/password
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral" : <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof" : <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_id>,
    "TwoFactorCode": 123456 // Required if enabled
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
        "Code": 1000,
        "ServerProof": <base64_encoded_proof>
    }

      Unlock password changes
      PUT/users/password

      Delete User ¶

      PUT https://api.protonmail.ch/users/delete
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "ClientEphemeral" : <base64_encoded_ephemeral>,
    "ClientProof" : <base64_encoded_proof>,
    "SRPSession": <hex_encoded_session_id>,
    "TwoFactorCode": 123456 // Required if enabled
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
        "Code": 1000,
        "ServerProof": <base64_encoded_proof>
    }

      Delete self, will invalidate API access token
      PUT/users/delete

      VPN ¶

      Get Client VPN Info ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/vpn
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "VPN": {
        "Status": 1, // 0 = no vpn access, 1 = vpn access, 2 = vpn access eligible, 3 = vpn access requested (waitlist)
        "ExpirationTime": 0, // only relevant for 'trial' plan, timestamp if non-zero
        "PlanName": "visionary", // other plans include 'free' and 'trial'
        "MaxConnect": 10,
        "MaxTier": 2,
        "GroupID": "jason",
        "Name": "jason", // OpenVPN name
        "Password": "lol" // OpenVPN password
    },
    "Subscribed": 5,
    "Services": 5,
    "Delinquent": 0
}

      Get client VPN information
      GET/vpn

      Get VPN Logical Server Loads and Scores ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/vpn/loads
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "LogicalServers": [
    {
      "ID": "-Bpgivr5H2qGDRiUQ4-7gm5YLf215MEgZCdzOtLW5psxgB8oNc8OnoFRykab4Z23EGEW1ka3GtQPF9xwx9-VUA==",
      "Load": 0,
      "Score": 1
    }
  ]
}

      Get array of VPN logical server loads and scores
      GET/vpn/loads

      Get Location ¶

      Get requester IP, latitude, and longitude ¶

      • Request (application/json;charset=utf-8)

        • Headers

          x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
  x-pm-apiversion: 3
  Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json

      • Response 200 (application/json;charset=utf-8)

        • Headers

        • Body

          {
      "Code": 1000,
      "IP": "83.76.246.115",
      "Lat": 46.1952,
      "Long": 6.1436,
      "Country": "CH",
      "ISP": "World-Connect Servies Sarl"
  }

      Get VPN server config ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/vpn/config?LogicalID&ServerID&Country&Category&Tier&Platform&udp
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {plaintext_file_content}

      Get the configuration file for a VPN server
      GET/vpn/config?{LogicalID,ServerID,Country,Category,Tier,Platform,Protocol}

      URI Parameters
      HideShow
      LogicalID
      string (optional) 

      the logical server ID

      ServerID
      string (optional) 

      the server ID

      Country
      string (optional) 

      the two-letter country code

      Category
      string (optional) 

      the category from which to get all configs

      Choices: Country Server SecureCore

      Tier
      int (optional) 

      the user’s tier, used with the Category parameter

      Platform
      string (required) 

      the platform that the config file is used on (case-insensitive)

      Choices: Windows macOS Linux iOS Android Router

      Protocol
      string (optional) Default: udp Example: udp

      the protocol used

      Choices: udp tcp

      Get auth server VPN Info ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/vpn/auth
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Username": "jason", // VPN username
    "ServerIP": "123.123.123.123", // Requested server
    "Secret": "6a1040241ed5dd5897b660d1927fbf9a587212b38186b86b4873801cd12b362d"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "VPN": {
        "Status": 1, // always 1, server error if != 1
        "ExpirationTime": 0, // only relevant for 'trial' plan, timestamp if non-zero
        "PlanName": "visionary",
        "MaxConnect": 10,
        "MaxTier": 2,
        "GroupID": "jason",
        "Name": "jason", // OpenVPN name
        "Password": "lol" // OpenVPN password
    }
}

      Get auth server VPN information
      POST/vpn/auth

      Get accounting server VPN Info ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/vpn/accounting
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Username": "jason", // VPN username
    "ServerIP": "123.123.123.123", // Requested server
    "Secret": "31691338caa3f688fe095e18ed9f7708aa7966c7ccb2f8e807b4773871c29130"
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000
    "VPN": {
        "GroupID": "jason" // For now same as VPN username
    }
}

      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
  "Secret": "82cc921c6a5c6707e1d6e6862ba3201a3870f13acff842549e0cb27ba6902d93",
  "Bytes": 30440
}

      Headers

      Body

  "Code": 1000,
  "Server": {

    "ExitIP": "95.215.61.164",
    "Domain": "es-04.protonvpn.com",

    "Enabled": 1

      Update server status ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/vpn/servers/status
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "Secret": "82cc921c6a5c6707e1d6e6862ba3201a3870f13acff842549e0cb27ba6902d93",
    "Status": 0, //0 for down event, 1 for up event
    "Services": 4 //services affected by this update
}
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Server": {
    "ID": "l8vWAXHBQmv0u7OVtPbcqMa4iwQaBqowINSQjPrxAr-Da8fVPKUkUcqAq30_BCxj1X0nW70HQRmAa-rIvzmKUA==",
    "Bytes": 30440,
    "ServicesDown": 4,
    "LoadUpdateTime": 1510953284,
    "EntryIP": "95.215.61.163",
    "ExitIP": "95.215.61.164",
    "Domain": "es-04.protonvpn.com",
    "MaxSpeed": 26214400,
    "Status": 0,
    "Load": 32,
    "Enabled": 1
}

      Get VPN active session count ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/vpn/sessioncount
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 1
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "SessionCount": 3
}

      VPN Profiles ¶

      Get VPN Profiles ¶

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/vpn/profiles
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 1000,
    "Profiles": [
        {
            "Name": "hello",
            "Color": "#f66",
            "Features": 1, // bitmap: 1 is secure core, 2 is tor, 4 is P2P, 8 is XOR, 16 is IPV6
            "LogicalID": "uVpvbvGpIO_az-Y1JNX4whHULAw5qnReYfMWmG4Yj-K1UypazCBTtZ4eecbgQcgTXs_KWXsRhOyAHTQv1_qTeA==",
            "Protocol": 1,
            "Country": "FE",
            "Type": 0, // 0 is specified server, 1 is fastest, 2 is random server
            "ID": "ARy95iNxhniEgYJrRrGvagmzRdnmvxCmjArhv3oZhlevziltNm07euTTWeyGQF49RxFpMqWE_ZGDXEvGV2CEkA=="
        }
    ]
}

      Get VPN profiles
      GET/vpn/profiles

      Create VPN profile ¶

      POST https://api.protonmail.ch/vpn/profiles
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Authorization: Bearer {this_is_test_access_token}
      x-pm-uid: {random_user_uid}
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "LogicalID": "uVpvbvGpIO_az-Y1JNX4whHULAw5qnReYfMWmG4Yj-K1UypazCBTtZ4eecbgQcgTXs_KWXsRhOyAHTQv1_qTeA==",
    "Color": "#f66",
    "Name": "hello",
    "Country": "FE",
    "Type": 0,
    "Features": 1, // bitmap: 1 is secure core, 2 is tor, 4 is P2P, 8 is XOR, 16 is IPV6
    "Protocol": 1, // 1 is TCP, 2 is UDP, 3 is no preference
}
      Responses200400400
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Profile": {
    "Name": "hello",
    "Color": "#f66",
    "Type": 0,
    "Features": 1,
    "LogicalID": "uVpvbvGpIO_az-Y1JNX4whHULAw5qnReYfMWmG4Yj-K1UypazCBTtZ4eecbgQcgTXs_KWXsRhOyAHTQv1_qTeA==",
    "Protocol": 1,
    "Country": "FE",
    "ID": "S6oNe_lxq3GNMIMFQdAwOOk5wNYpZwGjBHFr5mTNp9aoMUaCRNsefrQt35mIg55iefE3fTq8BnyM4znqoVrAyA=="
  }
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 86061,
  "Error": "Profile limit reached"
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 86064,
    "Error": "Invalid logical ID" // Could also be "Invalid name",
                                  // "A profile with this name already exists",
                                  // "Invalid country", "Invalid features", "Invalid protocol"

}

      Create VPN profile
      POST/vpn/profiles

      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other

      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Body
      {
    "LogicalID": "uVpvbvGpIO_az-Y1JNX4whHULAw5qnReYfMWmG4Yj-K1UypazCBTtZ4eecbgQcgTXs_KWXsRhOyAHTQv1_qTeA==",
    "Color": "#f66",
    "Name": "hello",
    "Type": 0,
    "Country": "FE",
    "Features": 1, // bitmap: 1 is secure core, 2 is tor, 4 is P2P, 8 is XOR, 16 is IPV6
    "Protocol": 1, 1 is TCP, 2 is UDP, 3 is no preference
}
      Responses200400400
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Profile": {
    "Name": "hello",
    "Color": "#f66",
    "Features": 1,
    "Type": 0,
    "LogicalID": "uVpvbvGpIO_az-Y1JNX4whHULAw5qnReYfMWmG4Yj-K1UypazCBTtZ4eecbgQcgTXs_KWXsRhOyAHTQv1_qTeA==",
    "Protocol": 1,
    "Country": "FE",
    "ID": "S6oNe_lxq3GNMIMFQdAwOOk5wNYpZwGjBHFr5mTNp9aoMUaCRNsefrQt35mIg55iefE3fTq8BnyM4znqoVrAyA=="
  }
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 86062,
  "Error": "Invalid profile ID"
}
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
    "Code": 86064,
    "Error": "Invalid logical ID" // Could also be "Invalid name",
                                  // "A profile with this name already exists",
                                  // "Invalid country", "Invalid features", "Invalid protocol"

}

      GET https://api.protonmail.ch/vpn/profiles/colors
      Requestsexample 1
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      x-pm-appversion: {app_version} or Other
      x-pm-apiversion: 3
      Accept: application/vnd.protonmail.v1+json
      Responses200
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8
      Body
      {
  "Code": 1000,
  "Colors": [
    "#7272a7",
    "cf55858"
  ]
}
